Juz jestes najbardziej wspoczujaca osoba na swiecie. Czego wiecej chcesz?
Musisz zaczekac jeden dzien zanim bedziesz mogl znow byc bardziej wspoczujacy.
Opancerzenie smoka jest w idealnym stanie.
Opancerzenie smoka jest w bardzo dobrym stanie.
Opancerzenie smoka jest w dobrym stanie.
Opancerzenie smoka jest bardzo zniszczone, i wymaga wymiany.
Nie mozesz usunac opancerzenia smokowi, ktory nie jest twoj.
Wskaz smoka bagiennego, ktoremu chcesz zalozyc opancerzenie:
To nie jest nieopancerzony smok bagienny.
Mozesz zalozyc opancerzenie tylko swojemu wlasnemu, oswojonemu smokowi bagiennemu.
Zalozyles opancerzenie na smoka bagiennego. Mozesz je w kazdej chwili sciagnac, uzywajac ostrego narzedzia na nim.
Atak przedziera sie przez Twoja obrone i zadaje wiecej obrazen!
Smocza zbroja Twego towarzysza wzmacnia Twoja obrone.
* Bestia probuje pochlonac cialo, ale nie udaje sie jej *
* Bestia wchlania pozostalosci cial napotkanych na swej drodze *
* Z ciala bestii wylania sie czerwony twor, ktory atakuje Cie *
Wybierz donice, w ktorej chcesz hodowac rosline:
Musisz wsadzic nasiona do donicy z ziemia.
Donica z ziemia musi byc w twoim plecaku, lub musi byc zablokowana.
Ziemia w tym naczyniu musi byc wczesniej podlana.
Zasadziles nasiona w donicy z ziemia.
Zeby uzyc tego przedmiotu, musisz go miec w plecaku, lub musi byc zablokowany.
Nie mozesz oproznic donicy, bo nie masz miejsca w plecaku!
To roslina ozdobna, ktora nie potrzebuje wody!
Nie mozesz zbierac pylkow zmutowanej rosliny!
Nie mozesz zbierac pylkow w tym stadium rozwoju rosliny!
Nie mozesz zbierac pylkow wiednacej rosliny!
Nie mozesz zbierac pylkow dekoracyjnej rosliny!
Wskaz rosline, z ktora chcesz skrzyzowac:
Ta roslina nie wyprodukowala zadnych nasion.
Roslina jest juz podlana tym rodzajem mikstur.
Rosliny i nasiona mozna podlewac tylko miksturami!
Ta mikstura jest za slaba, zeby nia podlewac rosline!
Nie mozesz tego uzyc na roslinie!
Nie mozesz krzyzowac roslin ze zmutowana roslina!
Ta roslina nie ma jeszcze kwiatostanu. Nie mozesz jeszcze zbierac pylkow.
Nie mozesz zbierac pylkow chorujacej rosliny!
Przyciales rosline. Roslina nie bedzie wiecej produkowac skladnikow badz nasion, ale nie bedzie rowniez wymagac opieki.
To roslina dekoracyjna, ktora nie potrzebuje wody!
Musisz wczesniej wsadzic nasiona do donicy.
Musisz miec swieza ziemie, zeby wyhodowac zdrowa rosline.
Musisz miec wiecej ziemii, zeby napelnic donice.

To zwierze nie podda się bez walki.
Nie jestes godnym przeciwnikiem, by wyzwac tego wladce!
Twoje mestwo wzroslo o wiele bardziej niz zwykle
Walecznosc to odwaga do podejmowania dzialan wspierajacych wlasne przekonania. Zyskujesz walecznosc, zabijajac stwory pojawiajace sie w regionach kontrolowanych przez Czempionow Zla.
Ktorego czempiona chcialbys wyzwac na pojedynek? Wskaz go prosze:
Musisz wycelowac w Idol Czempiona, aby wyzwac Czempiona na pojedynek!
Musisz byc Rycerzem Walecznosci, aby w ten sposob przywolac stwory czempiona!
Twoje wyzwanie zostalo uslyszane przez Czempiona tego regionu! Strzez sie jego gniewu!
Czempion tego regionu zostal juz wyzwany!
Czempion tego regionu ignoruje twoje wyzwanie. Musisz bardziej udowodnic swoja walecznosc.

Przyrodnik odrywa spojrzenie od swoich zapiskow i skupia pelen nadziei wzrok na Tobie.

Hmm...tak...przepraszam. Zastanawialem sie wlasnie czy bylbys w stanie mi pomoc. Bo widzisz, jestem znanym przyrodnikiem - dzentelmenem i naukowcem, zajmujacym sie glownie badaniem owadow i pajeczakow. Napisalem kilka interesujacych ksiag opisujacych cudowna rase Thretanow i ich niesamowita kulture. Ostatnio slyszalem plotki o czyms, co moze byc nieslychanie waznym odkryciem!

Najwyrazniej na swiecie pojawila sie nieznanego pochodzenia rasa mrowkopodobnych istot! Dasz wiare?! Zaprawde zyjemy w niesamowitych czasach! Dla naukowca takiego jak Ja to naprawde wyjatkowa okazja!

Mimo, ze jestem geniuszem w swojej dziedzinie, wyjatkowo bieglym w sztuce pisma z niechecia przyznaje, ze nie jestem typem lowcy przygod. Mimo, ze pomagano mi juz wczesniej nadal pozostalo wiele niewyjasnionych zagadnien.

Jestem szczegolnie zainteresowany zawistnie bronionymi przez robotnice mrowczymi wylegarniami. Jesli zgodzisz sie mi pomoc, poprosze Cie o zapuszczenie sie w glab gniazda mrowek i przebadanie wszystkich znajdujacych sie tam mrowczych wylegarni. W kazdej z nich bedziesz musial spedzic troche czasu na badaniach i obserwacji, co pozwoli na zebranie potrzebnych mi danych. Kiedy skonczysz zglos sie do mnie a ja wynagrodze Cie za twoj zacny uczynek.

Czy zgodzisz sie mi pomoc?

Brawo! To cudowna wiadomosc! Za kazdym razem, gdy moj asystent zapuszcza sie do mrowczego gniazda by zebrac tak potrzebne mi dane, czuje ze jestem o krok blizej wielkiego odkrycia! To samo czulem, gdy zdalem sobie sprawe, ze Trethanie musza potrafic magicznie zmieniac swe cialo tak by przypominac rozne warzywa i owoce! Wystarczy tylko dokladniej je przebadac by tego dowiesc!

Tak czy inaczej jestem Ci bardzo wdzieczny! Prosze, wroc do mnie, kiedy przebadasz wszystkie wylegarnie ukryte w mrowczym gniezdzie.

Odszukaj wejscie do mrowczego gniazda i znajdujace sie w srodku wylegarnie. Kazda z nich musi byc badana nieprzerwanie w pelnym skupieniu przez jakis czas.

Kiedy juz ukonczysz badania wylegarni, wroc do przyrodnika ktory zlecil Ci to zadanie.
Rozpoczynasz badanie wylegarni w celu zdobycia o niej jak najwiekszej ilosci informacji.
Przerywasz sporzadzanie notatek nie zebrawszy wszystkich potrzebnych informacji.
Przygladasz sie wylegarni i dochodzisz do wniosku, ze juz ja badales.
Przebadales wystarczajaca ilosc mrowczych wylegarni by zadowolic przyrodnika. Wroc do niego by odebrac swoja nagrode.

Przyrodnik odrywa wzrok od notatek i skupia spojrzenie na Tobie. Jest wyraznie zdenerwowany.

Jeszcze nie skonczyles przydzielonego Ci zadania? Ehh! Tak trudno w dzisiejszych czasach o kompetentnego asystenta!

Pamietaj, po pierwsze musisz odszukac wejscie do gniazda. Kiedy juz znajdziesz sie w srodku przebadaj wszystkie cztery mrowcze wylegarnie. Kiedy juz to zrobisz wroc do mnie po wynagrodzenie.

Teraz idz juz! Mam do przeanalizowania sterty notatek od bardziej kompetentnych asystentow!

Przyrodnik odrywa wzrok od notatek i skupia spojrzenie na Tobie. Jest wyraznie zadowolony.

Dzieki Ci! Zaprawde popisales sie! Zebrana przez Ciebie wiedza na pewno pomoze mi lepiej zrozumiec nature tych fascynujacych stworzen!

A teraz pozwol, ze przekaze Ci twoje uczciwie zapracowane wynagrodzenie.

Mam znajoma uczona zajmujaca sie przeroznej masci nasionami. Odkryla ona pewna mutacje u jednej z hodowanych przez siebie roslin. Dzieki swojej wiedzy i magii stworzyla z niej calkowicie nowa i niespotykana linie kolorowych nasion!

Twoja nagroda bedzie wlasnie jedno z tych wyjatkowych nasionek. A wlasnie... skoro juz przy tym jestesmy. Przypomnialo mi sie, ze mialem dokonczyc opis mrowczych zwyczajow zywieniowych. Z wielkim apetytem zjadaja wszelkiego rodzaju nasiona! Ach te mrowcze krolowe!

Tak czy inaczej musze wracac do swoich zajec. Jesli w przyszlosci bedziesz mial ochote mi pomoc wiesz gdzie mnie znalezc.

Przyrodnik odrywa wzrok od notatek i skupia spojrzenie na Tobie. Jest wyjatkowo uradowany.

Cudownie! Notatki, ktore sporzadziles mowia o tajemniczej ukrytej wylegarni? Slyszalem o niej opowiesci. Ponoc mrowki przechowuja tam wyjatkowe jaja. Szkoda, ze moja wiedza w tym temacie jest niepelna.

Notatki, ktore sporzadziles na pewno pomoga mi lepiej zrozumiec to zagadnienie.

Biorac pod uwage wyjatkowa wage twoich odkryc czuje, ze musze Cie odpowiednio wynagrodzic. Zasluzyles na specjalna nagrode...hmmm...

Mam znajoma uczona zajmujaca sie przeroznej masci nasionami. Odkryla ona pewna mutacje u jednej z hodowanych przez siebie roslin. Dzieki swojej wiedzy i magii stworzyla z niej calkowicie nowa i niespotykana linie kolorowych nasion!

Rozdalem kilka jej nasion paru moim asystentom jednak kilka z rzadszych nasion trzymam tylko dla siebie. Sa naprawde wyjatkowe! Jako ze tak swietnie sie spisales podziele sie nimi z Toba. W nagrode dostaniesz ognisto-czerwone nasionko!

Jeszcze raz stokrotne dzieki! Pozwol, ze teraz wroce do studiowania sporzadzonych przez Ciebie notatek. Uwazaj na siebie moj drogi asystencie i wroc do mnie, jesli w przyszlosci znajdziesz czas by mi pomoc.

Przyrodnik odrywa sie od notatek i zerka na Ciebie.

Witaj!

Jesli zechcialbys pomoc znanemu naukowcowi w jego pracy na pewno znajdzie sie dla Ciebie zajecie.

Wygladasz jednak na czlowieka, ktory ma w tej chwili inne zajecia. Moze dasz rade skonczyc to co obecnie zaprzata twoja uwage. Moglbys wtedy wrocic do mnie i dowiedziec sie wiecej.

Przyrodnik patrzy na Ciebie, przyjaznie sie usmiechajac.

Widze, ze powrociles z cennymi informacjami. Moze jednak zwolnisz w plecaku troche miejsca zanim przejdziemy do omowienia twojego wynagrodzenia?
Ukonczyles badanie tej niesamowitej wylegarni. Sporzadzone notatki chowasz do plecaka.
Zauwazasz tutaj wiele ciekawych rzeczy. Rozpoczynasz sporzadzanie notatek.
Ukonczyles badanie tej niesamowitej wylegarni. Przyrodnik na pewno bedzie zachwycony sporzadzonymi przez Ciebie notatkami.
Rozpoczynasz spisywanie swoich spostrzezen na pergaminowej karcie.

Krolowa mrowek przyglada sie Tobie przez chwile po czym mowi:

Hmmm... Byc moze moglbys mi sie na cos przydac jednak w tej chwili wygladasz na zajetego innym zajeciem. Wroc do mnie gdy skonczysz a byc moze bede miala dla Ciebie zadanie.

Krolowa mrowek przyglada sie Tobie przez chwile po czym mowi:

Tak tak, mysle ze mozesz mi sie przydac. Zwykle takie sprawy zalatwiam oczywiscie sama ale w tej chwili mam zbyt duzo na glowie. Duzo mam do zrobienia, oj duzo! Zreszta, jesli pewnego dnia mam zostac Matriarcha musze miec zaufanych poplecznikow, ktorym bede mogla powierzac rozne zadania.

Bo widzisz mam taki plan. Chce zostac nastepna Matriarcha. Nasza wladczyni ma sie dobrze jednak nie bedzie zyc wiecznie! Kiedy odejdzie to wlasnie ja mam zamiar ja zastapic! Bo widzisz, rzadzenie jest moim przeznaczeniem.

Zadanie, ktore chce Ci zlecic jest bardzo proste. Chce bys zlikwidowal moja hmmm... konkurencje. Tak naprawde wiekszosc z nich nawet na takie okreslenie nie zasluguje. Mowie oczywiscie o innych krolowych tej kolonii. Moich kochanych siostrach. Bylabym zachwycona gdyby udalo Ci sie usunac 5 z nich. Mowiac usunac mam na mysli ZABIC! Nie rob takiej miny - tak to bywa w rozwinietych spolecznosciach takich jak nasza. Albo odejda one albo ja. Zdecydowanie preferuje to pierwsze rozwiazanie.

Chcialabym rowniez bys zdobyl dla mnie grzyby zoogi - 50 napewno wystarczy.

Zgodzisz sie przyjac to zadanie?

Krolowa usmiecha sie gdy decydujesz sie jej pomoc.

Swietnie! Grzybami Zoogi bedziemy sie martwic pozniej. Tymczasem zacznij od zlikwidowania 5 krolowych.

To bardzo wazne! Pamietaj, ze musza byc to krolowe z mojej kolonii. Zabijanie krolowych z drugiej kolonii nie pomoze mi stac sie Matriarcha.

Zabijanie krolowych infiltratorow rowniez nie pomoze. Spelniaja one wazne funkcje szpiegujac druga kolonie. Wlasciwie nie wiem dlaczego nie mieli by tego robic wojownicy... Tak czy inaczej zabijanie ich w niczym nie pomoze.

Bierz sie do roboty! Bede tutaj czekac na twoj powrot.

Krolowa spoglada na Ciebie.

Wrociles nie wyeliminowawszy wszystkich pieciu krolowych z mojej kolonii. Przyjdz kiedy wypelnisz zadanie.

Pamietaj, ze krolowe infiltratory i krolowe z drugiej kolonii nie maja znaczenia dla twojego zdania.

Bierz sie do roboty! Bede tutaj czekac na twoj powrot.
Ukonczyles zadanie zabicia 5 mrowczych krolowych. Wroc do krolowej, ktora prosila Cie o pomoc.

Krolowa wyraznie raduje sie twoim widokiem.

Cudownie! Dobrze sobie poradziles likwidujac moja konkurencje. Teraz musze Cie prosic o zebranie dla mnie pewnej ilosci grzybow zoogi. Musze pocwiczyc transformowanie ich na proszek translokacji.

Z tego co pamietam umowilismy sie na 50 grzybow. Prosze wroc gdy uda ci sie tyle zdobyc i oddaj je mnie.

Bywaj.
Zbierz 50 grzybow zoogi i oddaj je krolowej.

Krolowa spoglada na Ciebie.

Zdobyles juz grzyby zoogi?

Jesli tak, podaj mi je. Jesli nie, zdobadz wiecej i przynies je do mnie.
Nie prosilam Cie o przyniesienie mi zadnych grzybow, dlatego nie moge ich przyjac.
Umawialismy sie, ze przyniesiesz mi 50 grzybow zoogi. Wroc kiedy juz zbierzesz ta ilosc.

Krolowa usmiecha sie odbierajac od Ciebie grzyby zoogi.

Cudownie! Doceniam twoje wysilki. Jestem coraz blizej mojego ostatecznego celu. Niestety pozostalo jeszcze wiele do zrobienia.

Stara, pomarszczona wiedzma podnosi glowe znad swojego cuchnacego kotla. Jej pojedyncze, nieruchome oko probuje skupic sie na Tobie, ale z marnym skutkiem.

Co to jest? Kto tam? Czego chcesz ode mnie? Nie mam czasu dla takich jak ty. Mam gulasze do przyprawienia i napary do ugotowania. Zbyt wiele rzeczy do wykonania, aby pomagac nieznajomemu.

Poza tym wyglada na to, ze masz juz zadanie, ktore musisz wykonac. Byc moze, jesli skonczysz swoje zadanie, wrocisz do mnie, a ja ci pomoge. Ale do tego czasu zostaw stara wiedzme sama z jej magia! Shoo! Precz z wami!

Wiedzma odpedza was machnieciem swojej zniszczonej reki i wraca do opiekowania sie szkodliwym naparem wrzacym w jej kociolku.

Stara, pomarszczona wiedzma podnosi glowe znad swojego cuchnacego kotla. Jej pojedyncze, nieruchome oko probuje skupic sie na Tobie, ale z marnym skutkiem.

Ech? Kto to jest? Kto tam? Czy stara kobieta sprawia ci klopoty?

Rozpruje cie i polkne wnetrznosci! Zamienie cie w kupe mazi, zrobie to! Ba! Jakbym nie mial dosc zmartwien. Jakbym i tak nie mial dosc klopotow!

Kolejny z moich przekletych uczniow zaginal! Glupie dzieci, mysla, ze wiedza wszystko. Powinienem zamienic wielu z nich w ropuchy - gdyby tylko wrocili z ukonczonym zadaniem! Ale w tym wlasnie tkwi problem, prawda? Nigdy nie wracaja!

Ale ciebie to nie obchodzi, prawda? Przypuszczam, ze jestes kolejnym z tych wscibskich dzieciakow, przyszedles mnie o cos zapytac? ech? Czy to to? Chcesz czegos ode mnie i oczekujesz, ze ci to oddam? Mam dosc klopotow z moimi uczniami i tym podlym impem, Zeefzorpulem! Zaloze sie, ze to on ma ich tak duzo! I kto wie, co zrobil? Podla drobnostka.

Jesli oczekujesz, ze pomoge ci w spelnieniu twoich glupich pragnien, najpierw zrobisz cos dla mnie, prawda? Oczekuje, ze pojdziesz poszukac mojego ucznia. Wyslalam go do jednej z wiosek w Panstwie Tasandorskim, ale nigdy nie wrocil. Znajdz go i sprowadz z powrotem, a dam ci mala nagrode, ktora na pewno ci sie spodoba.

Ale mowie ci, zebys uwazal na chochlika o imieniu Zeefzorpul! To nikczemna mala bestia, ktora lubi wyglupiac sie i bawic z ludzmi i ogolnie uprzykrzac wszystkim zycie. Jesli postawisz go na zlej stronie, z pewnoscia zrujnujesz dzien, w ktorym sie urodziles. Jakbys juz tego nie zrobil, z takim brzydkim kubkiem!

No coz, maly szczeniaku? Pomozesz starej wiedzmie czy nie?

To troche nie w stylu tej podlej starej wiedzmy, wydaje sie wrecz zachwycona, ze przyjales jej oferte.

Ach! To jest duch! W koncu nie jestes bezuzytecznym workiem kosci, prawda? W takim razie najlepiej wrzuc bieg i ruszaj w strone drogi! Pamietaj, moj mlody Uczen moze znajdowac sie w dowolnym miejscu na drodze prowadzacej do jednej z wiosek w Pastwie Tasandorskim, wiec pamietaj, aby przebiec cala trase i trzymac sie wlasciwej drogi!

I na litosc Smierci, wroc tu, kiedy bedziesz' znalazlem cos! I pamietaj, nie mam calego dnia! I uwazaj na impa Zeefzorpula! I nie wracaj z pustymi rekami! I spakuj cieply sweter! I nie deptaj mojego trawnika, wychodzac!

Co tu jeszcze robisz? Do dziela! Shoo!

Pomarszczona wiedzma patrzy na ciebie z jadem w oczach.

Co tu robisz? Chyba mowilem ci, zebys odnalazl mojego zaginionego Ucznia! Nie mam czasu na twoje lenistwo, ty nedzny robaku! Shoo! Precz z wami! I nie wracaj, dopoki nie dowiesz sie, co stalo sie z moim uczniem!

Badasz zweglone i zakrwawione zwloki, rozpoznajac je na podstawie opisu Wiedzmy jako zaginionego Ucznia, ktorego miales sprowadzic z powrotem.

Wyglada, jakby zostal przypalony ogniem i magia oraz podrapany okrutnymi pazurami .

Zastanawiasz sie, czy ten straszny czyn nie jest dzielem podlego impa Zeefzorpula, o ktorym mowila Wiedzma. Decydujesz, ze najlepiej bedzie, jak wrocisz do Wiedzmy i zglosisz swoje ustalenia.

Pomarszczona stara wiedzma podnosi wzrok znad kotla z wrzacymi wnetrznosciami.

Bach! Juz z powrotem? Nie widzisz, ze jestem zajety gotowaniem? Nie chcialbys sprobowac mojej pysznej zupy ze smoczych zoladkow, prawda? Glog! Tak myslalem.

Dosc juz tego gadania - jakie wiesci o moim Uczniu?

Co to jest? Mowisz, ze za jego zniknieciem stal ten okropny maly chochlik Zeefzorpul!? Czego Zeefzorpul chcialby od mojego Ucznia? Prawdopodobnie chce tylko uczynic moje zycie bardziej nieszczesliwym niz jest.

Czekaj! Ba! To musi byc to! Zeefzorpul musial sie dowiedziec, ze wyslalem moich uczniow z roznymi przepisami na magiczne napary - listami zadan i skladnikow do wykonania.

Ten nikczemny Zeefzorpul wie, ze potrzebuje listy skladnikow, ktora dalem temu uczniowi. Mam przepisy do miksowania, gulasze do ugotowania, magie do rzucenia i fortuny do wtracenia! Nie pozwole, zeby ta przekleta felchszum zepsula mi dzien. A zatem ty, ja potrzebuje, zebys znalazl Zeefzorpula i odzyskal ten kawalek pergaminu!

Nie jestem pewien, gdzie spedza swoj czas, ale jestem pewien, ze jesli znajdziesz jego przyjaciol-diablikow i zbesztasz ich wstawaj, za chwile na niego nakrzycza! Wszyscy znaja swoje sekretne kryjowki. Kontynuowac! Shoo! Idz i zabij kilka chochlikow, az wypluja swoje sekrety! Zadnej litosci dla tych malych paskudnikow!

Chorowita stara wiedzma podnosi wzrok znad wrzacego kotla.

Czy znalazles juz tego okropnego malego Zeefzorpula? Co!? Wrociles tutaj, nie wiedzac, gdzie jest Zeefzorpul i co zrobil z moim przepisem na magiczny napar?

Powiedzialem ci, co nalezy zrobic, maly szczeniaku! A teraz precz z wami! I nie wracaj, dopoki nie znajdziesz mojej listy skladnikow!

Nieszczesny chochlik wola o litosc.

Wybacz mi! Ty mistrzu! Ty wielki wojowniku, wielki hoomanie, wielki najwiekszy! Przebaczyc! Przebaczyc! Poddaje sie Zeefowi! On w zaden sposob nie jest dobry! Zawsze bil mnie po glowie i niezle mnie ranil! On tez mowi, ze jestem brzydka, mimo ze jestem ladna!

Ale ja wiem, gdzie sie ukrywa! Podazam za nim, trzepoczac do jego kryjowki. Mysli, ze jest taki madry, ale tak bardzo sie myli! Rysuje bazgrolami miejsca, w ktorych lubi sie ukrywac! Ale potrzebny jest sygnalista, zeby on przyszedl! On nie przyjdzie bez tego! Zrob gwizdkiem w jego kryjowce, a Zeef musi przyjsc, nie moze sie oprzec!

Przerazony imp wrecza ci zmieta mape i dziwny flet.

Idziesz do miejsca, ktore pokazuje zdjecie, a nastepnie grasz w gwizdek! Zeef, przyjdz, obiecuje! Ale obiecaj, ze dobrze walniesz Zeefa w glowe! Proosszkuuuu?

Po tej ostatniej prosbie nieszczesny maly chochlik upada i przestaje oddychac.

W kłębie dymu pachnącego siarką pojawia się imp Zeefzorpul.

No co!? Jak głupi hooman znalazł potężnego Zeefzorpula? To szaleństwo wiele razy! To szaleństwo nie jest możliwe! To wielkie szaleństwo z szaleństwem na szczycie! Ale to się dzieje! Jak to może być prawdą!?

GAH! Nawet potężny Zeefzorpul nie może się oprzeć tej szalonej muzyce! Potężny Zeefzorpul, rób, co chcesz! Oddaj mi tę głupią gazetę! Potężny Zeefzorpul wcale tego nie chce. To głupie. To super głupie. Wielkie, głupie jak głupie, głupie drzewo z głupimi rzeczami na nim! Tak głupi! Tak głupi, że potężny Zeefzorpul nawet się tym nie przejmuje! Widzisz, że mnie to nie obchodzi? Lepiej, bo to na pewno się dzieje! Ani trochę mnie to nie obchodzi!

Dziwny mały chochlik rzuca w ciebie kawałkiem pergaminu. Jednak ku twojemu zaskoczeniu, on spada w dół w błysku trzepoczących skrzydeł i kradnie Ci Czarodziejski Flet.

Ha! Taki głupi jak hooman! Potężny Zeefzorpul pokonał głupiego Hoomana i jest największym chochlikiem na świecie! Ty naprawdę głupi, panie Hooman. Wielki głupek z głupcem na górze. Teraz już nie możesz mnie oszukać szaloną muzyką taneczną! Potężny Zeefzorpul odlatuje do swojego drugiego sekretnego domu, gdzie nigdy więcej go nie znajdziesz!

Mam nadzieję, że zostaniesz pożarty przez trolla!

W ten sposób imp Zeefzorpul znika w kolejnym zaciągnięciu zjełczałego dymu.

Pokryta brodawkami wiedzma podnosi wzrok znad wsypywania cuchnacych skrawkow miesa do kotla.

Poradziles sobie z tym klopotliwym impem Zeefzorpulem? Brawo dla ciebie, maly! Nie jestes tak bezuzyteczny, jak sie wydaje, nawet dla takiej glupiej starej dziewki jak ja!

Widze, ze odzyskales moj cenny przepis na magiczny napar. Zakladam, ze oczekujesz nagrody? Coz, mozesz dalej oczekiwac, a ja moge dalej byc brzydka. Coz mi z tego, ze mam liste, skoro nie mam ucznia, ktory zbieralby skladniki i sam wykonywal zadania!

Jesli chcesz otrzymac swoja cenna mala nagrode, bedziesz musial wykonac zadanie, ktore zlecilem mojemu poprzedniemu Uczniowi. Idz stad! Mam gotowane glowy i gulasze do przyprawienia! Nie wracaj, dopoki nie wykonasz wszystkich pozycji na tej liscie!

Sprośny, stary kapitan piratów podnosi wzrok znad butelki whisky Wild Harpy, pijany jak każdy mężczyzna, jakiego kiedykolwiek widziałeś.

Nieznośnie powolnym ruchem odsuwa swój tricorne kapelusz i patrzy na ciebie w dół z zaczerwienionymi oczami.

Czego chcesz, żeby płonęło, szczurze lądowym? Masz może dobrą whisky Kapitana Czarnego Serca? Cóż, możesz utonąć w siedmiu morzach, ty pokryty pąklami zęzowy szczurze!

Wycinałem takich kretynów jak ty za mniejsze zniewagi! Pływam po morzach po tym świecie od pięćdziesięciu lat i nigdy nie widziałem bardziej przesiąkniętej mlekiem bratki, jak ty, która przyszłaś tu po przysługę. Dać ci trochę mojej specjalnej whisky? Wolałbym siłować się nago z wężem morskim – a zrobiłem to jakieś dwadzieścia razy!

Widzisz, stara Whisky Kapitana Czarnego Serca jest przeznaczona tylko dla piratów. I nie wyglądasz na żadnego pirata, jakiego kiedykolwiek widziałem. Musisz mieć odpowiedni krój materiału i odpowiednią ilość alkoholu w brzuchu, aby żeglować w mojej załodze! A bez tego równie dobrze możesz wrócić do domu i wypłakać się mamie. Bo nigdy nie napijecie się ze mną drinka!

A teraz precz!

Po tych słowach Kapitan Czarne Serce wraca do śpiewania swoich sprośnych piosenek i picia whisky . Wygląda na to, że będziesz musiała znaleźć sposób, aby zmienić jego zdanie na temat twojej wartości.

Pijany pirat, Kapitan Czarne Serce, z zadowolonym wyrazem twarzy podnosi wzrok znad butelki whisky.

No coz, spojrz tutaj! Nie sadzilem, ze szczur ladowy taki jak ty ma w sobie piracka krew! Ale spojrz na to! Z pewnoscia wygladasz teraz na te czesc! Na pewno mozesz jeszcze utrzymac sie na nogach? Har!

Awascie, kochany piracie! Zaslugujesz na pas lepszego trunku niz ten, ktory piles, a ja mam cos takiego.

Nazywam to Whiskey Kapitana Czarnego Serca i jeza ci sie wlosy na klatce piersiowej, to wszystko Jasne. Kiedys na moj statek rozlala sie beczka tego czegos i wyzarla dziure w pokladzie!

No dalej, napij sie albo uzyj tego do oczyszczenia kordelasu z rdzy - to najlepszy napar tak czy inaczej!

Kapitan Blackheart wrecza Ci dzZgubak swojej slynnej whisky. Uwazasz, ze najlepiej bedzie zwrocic go Wiedzmie, niz wypic jakikolwiek szkodliwy plyn.

Starozytna wiedzma podnosi wzrok znad bulgoczacego napoju i patrzy na ciebie jednym zdrowym okiem.

Wrociles juz, prawda? A co z twoim zadaniem? Czy zebrales wszystkie potrzebne skladniki?

Co to jest!? Nadal nie ukonczyles prostego zadania, ktore przed toba postawilem? Wiec po co tu wracac i zawracac mi glowe? Nie ugotuje ani jednego naparu, jesli bedziesz mnie nekal swoimi jeczacymi przemowami! Jestes gorszy od mojego ostatniego ucznia, a on byl prawdziwym krolem glupcow!

No dalej! Odejdz i odejdz! Nie chce widziec skory i wlosow twojej marudzacej twarzyczki, dopoki nie zbierzesz wszystkich skladnikow z tej listy!

One last task. I would like a set of toy monster figurines made by the famous toymaker, Tomas O'Neerlan. You'll find him in Trinsic. He's often at the Tinker's Guild. Try looking there.

You're doing quite well. Quite well indeed. Knew you would. Just like old times. Yes. Quite good.
Tomas O'Neerlan jest slawnym wytworca zabawek. Obecnie przebywa w force w Nowym Haven, gdzie tworzy zabawki dla dzici straznikow. Odwiedz go, udaj sie tam czem predzej.

Tomas smiles freely as you speak to him.

Ah, to be sure I can make you some toy monster figurines. That's my work, making toys. Worry not, we'll put together a good set of monsters for you and your figurines.

But I'll be needing something from you before I can begin. Here, take these enchanted paints. Using them, you can capture a set of images of the creatures you wish me to make into toys. It'll only work on the group of creatures I select for your set of figurines. Oh, and I'll be needing those enchanted paints back when all is said and done.
Uzyj zaczarowanych farb, aby uchwycic wizerunek wszystkich stworzen wymienionych ponizej.

Patrzysz, jak Elwood kreci sie blogo na swoim stolku.

Och. Wybacz mi. Nie widzialem cie tam. Whoo. Oszolomiony. Nie widze prosto. Dostales juz te figurki? Nie. Ach. Nie martwic sie. Tak trzymac. Bez watpienia sobie z tym poradzisz.

Przepraszam na chwile. Mysle, ze musze usiasc. Czekac. siedze. Dobrze wiec. Tak. Siada.

Elwood wyciaga reke i chwyta blat, jakby chcial sie uspokoic.
You have no interest in capturing the image of this creature.
The enchanted paints swirl for a moment then an image begins to take shape. *Click*
Masz teraz wszystkie potrzebne obrazy stworzen. Wroc do Tomasa O'Neerlana, aby mogl wykonac zabawkowe figurki.

Tomas wita Cie serdecznie, gdy sie zblizasz.

Milo cie widziec. Widze, ze nie zebrales jeszcze wszystkich potrzebnych zdjec. - Wszystko w porzadku, ale bede ich potrzebowac, zanim bede mogl zrobic zabawkowe figurki. Wroc, gdy bedziesz miec pelny zestaw obrazow.

Elwood nagle sie zatrzymuje i przywoluje cie do siebie.

Tutaj. Chodz tu. Nie przejmuj sie, ale wydaje mi sie, ze jeden z karczmarzy byl kiedys wedrownym uzdrowicielem. Mowil cos o starych, dobrych czasach, kiedy ludzie po prostu podchodzili i wreczali im zloto. Stosy zlota. Niespodziewanie. Czy potrafisz sobie wyobrazic? Majac tyle zlota, ten byly uzdrowiciel postanowil kupic tawerne i sie osiedlic. To naprawde smutne. Teraz nawet nie moge wyleczyc kaca. Ale ladna tawerna.

Racja. W kazdym razie. Daj mi znac, kiedy figurki beda gotowe. Bede tu. Jak zawsze

Tomas grins as you walk toward him.

I see that you have collected all of the images we need. 'Tis good. I'll begin straight away on the toy figurines. I'll have them delivered to you when ready. Where shall I send them? To Elwood in Haven? Yes, I know him. We've done business in the past. Odd fellow.

Tomas smiles as you return his enchanted paints back to him.
Wroc do Elwooda z wiadomoscia, ze figurki zostana dostarczone, gdy beda gotowe.

Elwood spiewa, gdy go witasz.

Chodz. Dolaczcie. To piosenka Gabriela Piete'a. Posiadam do niego nuty. Jest nawet z autografem samego Gabriela Piete. Tak. Jedna z jego piosenek. Wspaniale.

Wiec pozwol mi zobaczyc zabawki. Figurki. Zobaczmy je. Oh. Jeszcze ich nie masz. Widze. Dobrze. Dobra. To niedobrze.

Elwood popija piwo, kiedy sie do niego zwracasz.

Ach. O to chodzi. Ale. Nic lepszego. Co to jest? Dostarczone zostana figurki zabawkowe. Prawidlowy. Tak. Byc moze lepsze niz Ale. Trudny.

Bardzo dobra robota. Calkiem. Mysle, ze juz skonczylismy. Skonczyles wszystko, o co cie prosilem. Wspolpracowalbym z toba ponownie. Tak. Powinnismy.

Ach. Tak. Twoja platnosc. Zwykly. Mysle, ze bedziesz zadowolony.

Elwood grzebie w swoim plecaku. W koncu wyciaga mala torebke i podaje ja tobie.

Elwood patrzy na ciebie, gdy sie zblizasz.

Znam cie. O tak. Zalatwiles dla mnie kilka spraw. Juz prawie gotowe. Zauwazylem, ze twoj plecak jest troche pelny. Moze chce zrobic troche miejsca. Nie bedziemy mogli wstrzymac platnosci. Wroc, gdy bedziesz miec wiecej miejsca, i dokonczymy nasza sprawe.
Wroc do Elwood po nagrode, gdy bedziesz miec troche miejsca w plecaku.
a section of an obsidian statue
This device is used to purify water. For it to work, three key ingredients are required: a plague beast core, some moonfire brew, and a fragment of obsidian.
You do not have the necessary ingredients. The contraptions rumbles angrily but does nothing.

You add the required ingredients and activate the contraption. It rumbles and smokes and then falls silent. The water shines for a brief moment, and you feel confident that it is now much less tainted than before.
You throw the switch, but the mechanism cannot be engaged again so soon.
I am the guardian of the Tomb of Sektu. Suffer my wrath!
You try to pry the box open, when you notice that there is no opening.  It's a fake box.

You are attempting to replace your current house.  Your house will vanish and the land it occupies will be outlined in red.  For 10 minutes, only you will be allowed to place a house over the red-outlined land.  You can use any house placement tool to place any house type in a new location near to or directly on the reserved land.  If you successfully place a new house, the land reservation markings will disappear and others may attempt to place houses in that area.  If you fail to place a new house in 10 minutes, die, log out, or move more than 30 tiles from the center of the reserved land, your original house will reappear at its previous location.  All of your locked down and secure items will be preserved in a House Moving Crate while you do this.  Are you sure you wish to continue?

More than ten minutes have passed since you initiated House Replacement.  Since you have not yet placed your original house in a new location or placed a new house, your original house has been restored to its original location.

You have moved more than 30 tiles away from the center of your original house, or you have crossed subserver boundaries.  Since you have not yet placed your original house in a new location or placed a new house, your original house has been restored to its original location.

You have died, lost connection, or logged out.  Since you have not yet placed your original house in a new location or placed a new house, your original house has been restored to its original location.
You have successfully relocated your original house.  All of its contents have been moved with the house.

You have successfully replaced your original house with a new house. The value of the replaced house has been deposited into your bank box. All of the items in your original house have been relocated to a Moving Crate in the new house. Any deed-based house add-ons have been converted back into deeds. Vendors and barkeeps in the house, if any, have been stored in the Moving Crate as well. Use the Get Vendor context-sensitive menu option on your character to retrieve them. These containers can be used to re-create the vendor in a new location. Any barkeepers have been converted into deeds.

You are about to turn your house into a customizable house.  You will be refunded the value of this house, and then be charged the cost of the equivalent customizable dirt lot.  All of your possessions in the house will be transported to a Moving Crate.  Deed-based house add-ons will be converted back into deeds.  Vendors and barkeeps will also be stored in the Moving Crate.  Your house will be leveled to its foundation, and you will be able to build new walls, windows, doors, and stairs.  Are you sure you wish to continue?
I'd rather stay dead, you scoundrel!!!
Wishing to rejoin the living, are you?  I can restore your body... for a price of course...
Do you accept the fee, which will be withdrawn from your bank?
You decide against paying the healer, and thus remain dead.
Unfortunately, you do not have enough cash in your bank to cover the cost of the healing.
~1_AMOUNT~ gold has been withdrawn from your bank to cover the price of the healing.
You're not skilled enough to attempt the theft of this item.
You strike and hide in the shadows!
You are dazed by the attack and your attacker vanishes!
Your precise strike has increased the level of the poison by 1
The force of your attack has dislodged them from their mount!
You fall off of your mount and take damage!
Your attacker strikes with lightning speed!
You fail to execute your special move
You have delivered a crushing blow!
You take extra damage from the crushing attack!

An old man who looks to be 200 years old from the looks of his translucently pale and heavily wrinkled skin, turns to you and gives you a half-cocked grin that makes you feel somewhat uneasy.

After a short pause, he begins to speak to you...

Hmm. What's this? Another budding Necromancer to join the ranks of Evil? Here... let me take a look at you... Ah yes... Very Good! I sense the forces of evil are strong within you, child – but you need training so that you can learn to focus your skills against those aligned against our cause. You are destined to become a legendary Necromancer - with the proper training, that only I can give you.

Mardoth pauses just long enough to give you a wide, skin-crawling grin.

Let me introduce myself. I am Mardoth, the guildmaster of the Necromantic Brotherhood. I have taken it upon myself to train anyone willing to learn the dark arts of Necromancy. The path of destruction, decay and obliteration is not an easy one. Only the most evil and the most dedicated can hope to master the sinister art of death.

I can lend you training and help supply you with equipment – in exchange for a few services rendered by you, of course. Nothing major, just a little death and destruction here and there - the tasks should be easy as a tasty meat pie for one as treacherous and evil as yourself.

What do you say? Do we have a deal?

Excellent choice, young apprentice of evil!

I will not waste our time with pleasantries. There is much work to be done – especially in light of the recent Paladin ambushes that we have suffered. The necromantic brotherhood is working towards the summoning of the elder daemon Kronus, who will rise from the Well of Tears to help us finally crush the Paladin forces that have plagued our lands for so long now.

To summon Kronus, we must energize the Well of Tears with a series of dark rituals. Unfortunately the rituals needed to sufficiently energize the Well of Tears have been lost to us. Your task will be to recover one of the ritual scrolls needed for the summoning.

You will need to find the corpse of the Arch Necromancer Maabus, which has been laid to rest in the tomb of elders. We believe his spirit may have memory of where we may find the scrolls needed for the summoning. You will need to awaken him from the slumber of death, using your Animate Dead spell, of course.

To reach the tomb, step onto the magical teleporter just to the West of where I am standing.

Once you have been teleported, follow the path, which will lead you to the tomb of Maabus.

One more thing before you go:

Should you get into trouble out there or should you lose your way, do not worry. I have also given you a magical horn - a Horn of Retreat. Play the horn at any time to open a magical gateway that leads back to this tower.

Should your horn run out of charges, simply hand me the horn to have it recharged.

Good luck friend.
Re-animate the corpse of Maabus using your Animate Dead spell and question him about the Kronus rituals.

Maabus emits an ear-crawling screech as his body reanimates. He turns and angrily screams at you:

YOU INFIDEL! HOW DARE YOU AWAKEN MAABUS!?!

Maabus continues to scream at you angrily for some time. As he settles down, you explain to him the purpose of your visit. Once you explain that you are on a quest to summon the elder daemon Kronus, Maabus begins to cooperate, and begins to speak in a more reasonable tone:

Well, why didn’t you say so? If you’re going to raise Kronus from the Well of Tears, you must first complete a long series of dark rituals. I once owned one of the scrolls needed for the summoning, but alas it was lost to me when I lost my life to a cowardly Paladin ambush near the Paladin city of Light. They would have probably hidden the scroll in their precious crystal cave near the city.

There is a teleporter in the corner of this tomb. It will transport you near the crystal cave at which I believe one of the calling scrolls is hidden. Good luck.

Maabus' body slumps back into the coffin as your magic expires.
Take the teleporter in the corner of Maabus' tomb to the crystal cave where the calling scroll is kept.

An old man, dressed in slightly tattered armor, whom you recognize to be a Paladin stands before the Crystal Cave staring blankly into the space in front of him. As he begins to speak to you, you realize this man is blind. You attempt to persuade the blind man that you are a Paladin seeking to inspect the scroll of calling...

Greetings traveler!

You seek entrance to the Crystal Cave, home of the Calling Scroll? Hmm. You reak of death and decay, brother. You reak of death like a Necromancer, but yet you claim to be a Paladin in hopes that I will grant thee passage into the cave?

Please don’t think ill of me for this, but I’m just a blind, old man looking to keep the brotherhood of Paladins safe from the clutches of the elder daemon Kronus. The Necromancers have been after this particular scroll for quite some time, so we must take all the security precautions we can.

Before I can let you pass into the Crystal Cave, you must speak to me the secret word that is kept in the Scroll of Abraxus in the Vault of Secrets at the Paladin city of Light. It’s the only way that I can be sure you are who you claim to be, since Necromancers cannot enter the Vault due to powerful protective magic that the brotherhood has blessed the vault with.
Infiltrate the city of the Paladins and figure out a way into the Vault. See Mardoth for help with this objective.

Mardoth looks at you expectantly until you tell him that you failed to retrieve the scroll...

You failed? Very unfortunate... So now you must find your way into the paladin’s Vault of Secrets, eh? Well, you won't be able to get in – there is a powerful magic aura that protects the Vault from all Necromancers. We simply cannot enter. However, that's not to say your familiar spirit can't.

Mardoth grins with obvious satisfaction as he explains the details of the Summon Familiar spell to you..., which will allow you to summon a scavenging Horde Minion to steal the scroll.

Very well. You are prepared to go. Take the teleporter just to the West of where I am standing to transport to the Paladin city of Light. Once you have arrived in the city, follow the road of glowing runes to the Vault of Secrets. You know what to do.
Use the teleporter near Mardoth to be transported to the Paladin City of Light.
Follow the road paved with glowing runes to find the Vault of Secrets.  Be careful not to give yourself away as a Necromancer while in the city.

You have arrived in the Vault of Secrets. You can feel the protective magic in this place restricting you, making you feel nearly claustrophobic.

Just ahead of you and out of your reach, you see a collection of scrolls and books, one of them being entitled 'Scroll of Abraxus' . You can only assume that this scroll holds the current password required to enter the Crystal Cave.

This would be a good opportunity to summon your familiar. Since your familiar is not a Necromancer, it will not be affected by the anti-magic aura that surrounds the Vault.

Summon your familiar with the Summon Familiar spell.
You instinctively will your familiar to fetch the book for you.

This would be a good opportunity to summon your familiar. Since your familiar is not a Necromancer, it will not be affected by the anti-magic aura that surrounds this Vault.

Summon your familiar and will it to fetch the book for you.
You instinctively will your familiar to fetch the scroll for you.

You have obtained the Scroll of Abraxus, which contains the secret password needed to gain passage into the Crystal Cave where the Scroll of Calling is kept. Read the scroll (double click) and figure out the password.

Once you have the password, return to the Crystal Cave and speak the password to the guard.

If you do not know the way to the Crystal Cave from the Paladin City, you can use the magic teleporter located just outside of the vault.
Now that you have the password, return to the Crystal Cave to speak with the guard there.  Use the teleporter outside of the vault to get there if necessary.

Security at the Crystal Cave

We have taken great measures to ensure the safety of the Scroll of Calling, which we have so valiantly taken from the Necromancer Maabus during the battle of the wood nearly 200 years ago.

The scroll must never fall into the hands of the Necromancers again, lest they use it to summon the ancient daemon Kronus. The scroll of calling is a necessity in the series of dark rites the Necromancers must perform to once again re-awaken Kronus.

Should Kronus ever rise again, the days of the Paladins, and indeed humanity as we know it will be numbered.

For this reason, we have posted the honorable Horus, former General of the Northern Legions to guard the entrance of the Crystal Cave where we keep the Scroll of Calling. Horus was infused with magical life from the tree Urywen during his last battle. The power gave him eternal life, but it also, unfortunately, took his eye sight.

Since Horus cannot see those he admits to the Crystal Cave, he will only allow those that know the secret password to enter. Speak the following word to Horus and he shall grant you passage to the Crystal Cave:

Urywen

Do not speak this password anywhere except when seeking passage into the Crystal Cave, as our adversaries are lurking in the shadows – they are everywhere.

Go with the light, friend.

- Frater Melkeer
Speak the secret word that you read in the scroll stolen from the Vault to Horus the guard, using his context menu.

Very well Paladin, you have proven to me your identity. I grant thee passage.

Be careful, however – I’ve heard that the cave has been infested with a vermin of some sort. Our High Lord Melkeer was supposed to send some troops to clear the vermin out of the cave, but that was last week already. I fear that he forgot.

If you can find it in your goodness to dispose of at least 5 of those vermin in there, I shall reward your efforts. If however you are too busy, and I would understand if you were, don’t bother with the vermin.

You may now pass through the energy barrier to enter the Crystal Cave. Take care honorable Paladin soul. Walk in the light my friend.
Enter the Crystal Cave and find the Scroll of Calling.  The barrier will now allow you to pass.
You rummage through the scrolls until you find the Scroll of Calling.  You quickly put it in your pack.

You have returned with the scroll! I knew I could count on you. You can now perform the rite of calling at the Well of Tears. This ritual will help charge the Well to prepare for the coming of Kronus. You are prepared to do your part young Necromancer!

Just outside of this tower, you will find a path lined with red lanterns. Follow this path to get to the Well of Tears. Once you have arrived at the Well, use the scroll to perform the ritual of calling. Performing the rite will empower the well and bring us that much closer to the arrival of Kronus.

Once you have completed the ritual, return here for your promised reward.
I will slay you before I allow you to complete your evil rites!
Step onto the teleporter near Mardoth and follow the path of glowing runes to the tomb of Maabus.
Find the Crystal Cave password by reading (double click) the golden scroll entitled "Scroll of Abraxus" that you got from your familiar..
You have disposed of the creatures as Horus has asked. See him on your way out of the Crystal Cave to claim your reward.
You have obtained the scroll of calling. See Mardoth for further instructions.
Follow the red lanterns to the Well of Tears where you will perform the calling of Kronus.
You have arrived at the well, but no longer have the scroll of calling.  Use Mardoth's teleporter to return to the Crystal Cave and fetch another scroll from the box.
Use the Scroll of Calling (double click) near the Well of Tears to charge the waters for the arrival of Kronus.
Victory! You have done as Mardoth has asked of you. Take as much of your foe's loot as you can carry and return to Mardoth for your reward.
Although you were slain by the cowardly paladin, you managed to complete the rite of calling as instructed. Return to Mardoth.

You have done as I asked... I knew I could count on you from the moment you walked in here!

The forces of evil are strong within you. You will become a great Necromancer in this life - perhaps even the greatest.

My work for you is done here. I release you from my service to go into the world and fight for our cause...

Oh...I almost forgot - your reward. Here is a magical weapon and 2000 gold for you, in the form of a check. Don't spend it all in one place though, eh?

Actually, before you can spend any of it at all, you will have to cash the check at the nearest bank. Shopkeepers never accept checks for payment, they require cash.

In your pack, you will find an enchanted sextant. Use this sextant to guide you to the nearest bank.

Farewell, and stay true to the ways of the shadow...
Use the enchanted sextant in your pack to locate the nearest bank.  Go there and speak with the Banker.
Locate the nearest Bank using the enchanted sextant in your pack. Once there, cash your check.

The banker smiles at you and greets you in a loud and robust voice...

Well hello there adventurer! I see you've learned how to cash checks. Wonderful! Let me tell you a bit about the banks in this world...

Anything that you place into any bank box, can be retrieved from any other bank box in the land. For instance, if you place an item into a bank box in Britain, it can be retrieved from your bank box in Moonglow or any other city.

Bank boxes are very secure. So secure, in fact, that no one can ever get into your bank box except for yourself. Security is hard to come by these days, but you can trust in the banking system of Britannia! We shall not let you down!

I hope to be seeing much more of you as your riches grow! May your bank box overflow with the spoils of your adventures.

Farewell adventurer, you are now free to explore the world on your own.

In case you change your mind later...

You may re-start this quest at any time, simply by returning to Mardoth's home and speaking with him using his context menu.
You have made my work easy for me, ~1_NAME~.  My task here is done.
You cannot escape me, knave of evil!
You were unable to take the scroll.
A strange terror grips your heart as you attempt to read the scroll.  You decide it would be a bad idea to read it out loud.
You read the scroll, but decide against performing the calling until you are instructed to do so by Mardoth.
You must be at the Well of Tears in the city of Necromancers to use this scroll.
A strange magical force prevents your spell from working.
Your backpack is too full to carry all the loot.
Nie mozesz dosiasc wierzchowca bedac sparalizowanym.
Otrzymujesz obrazenia od wirowego ataku przeciwnika!
Krwawiace rany zostaly uleczone, przestales krwawic.
Dezorientacja minela, mozesz ponownie zalozyc bron.

You cannot cleanse a creature of poison when it is already dead!
You cannot heal a creature that is already dead!

Potrzebujesz ~1_SKILL_REQUIREMENT~ umiejetnosci walki na ten atak.

Masz za malo umiejetnosci Zatruwanie na ten atak.
Locate the corpse of Maabus inside of the Tomb of Elders.

You have arrived in the Vault of Secrets. You can feel the protective magic in this place restricting you, making you feel nearly claustrophobic.

Just ahead of you and out of your reach, you see a collection of scrolls and books, one of them being entitled 'Scroll of Abraxus' . You can only assume that this scroll holds the current password required to enter the Crystal Cave.
Nie mozesz tego zrobic bedac martwym.
Przyrosc karmy zostal odblokowany. Twoja karma zacznie znowu wzrastac.
Przyrosc karmy zostal zablokowany. Twoja karma przestanie wzrastac.
Summon your Horde Minion familiar to fetch the scroll for you.
You are not dead, and thus cannot be resurrected!
Niech twoje zloto przysluzy sie najbardziej potrzebujacym.
Double click your Horde Minion to open his pack and retrieve the Scroll of Abraxus that he looted for you.
You have already performed the Krouns calling.
You cannot poison that! You can only poison infectious weapons, food or drink.
You cannot poison that! You can only poison infectious weapons.
You are no longer mortally wounded.

Uzeraan greets you as you approach...

Greetings traveler!

I am Uzeraan, the lord of this house and overseer of this fine city, Haven. I know we have just met, but time is short and we need to reinforce the troops in the mountain pass, so I will not waste your time with pleasantries.

We have been trying to fight back the wicked Horde Minions which have recently begun attacking our cities - but to no avail. We desperately need help!

Your first task will be to assess the situation in the mountain pass, and help our troops defeat the Horde Minions there.

Before I send you into battle however, it is time that I teach you a thing or two about the way of the Paladin.

The Paladin

Paladins are the holy warriors of the realm who have dedicated themselves as protectors of the virtues and vanquishers of all that is evil.

Paladins have several special abilities that are not available to the ordinary warrior. Due to the spiritual nature of these abilities, the Paladin requires some amount of mana to activate them. In addition to mana, the Paladin is also required to spend a certain amount of tithing points each time a special ability is used.

Tithing points and mana are automatically consumed when a special Paladin ability is activated. All Paladin abilities are activated through the Book of Chivalry

Go now, to the shrine just East of here, just before the doors and tithe at least 500 gold.

Return here when you are done.

The Paladin

Paladins are the holy warriors of the realm who have dedicated themselves as protectors of the virtues and vanquishers of all that is evil.

Paladins have several special abilities that are not available to the ordinary warrior. Due to the spiritual nature of these abilities, the Paladin requires some amount of mana to activate them. In addition to mana, the Paladin is also required to spend a certain amount of tithing points each time a special ability is used.

Tithing points and mana are automatically consumed when a special Paladin ability is activated. All Paladin abilities are activated through the Book of Chivalry

Go now, to the shrine just East of here, just before the doors and tithe at least 500 gold.

Return here when you are done.

Cleanse by Fire is the basic Cure ability for the Paladin. The Paladin uses the Cleanse by Fire ability to neutralize any poisons from a target. When he does this, he takes an amount of fire damage based on a combination of his Karma and Chivalry levels. The lower the Paladin's Karma, the higher the fire damage. The higher the Paladin's Chivalry skill is, the lower the amount of fire damage taken.

Close Wounds is the basic healing ability for a Paladin. Using this ability, allows the Paladin to target another player or creature for divine healing. The amount of Hit Points healed depends on the Paladin’s level of Karma and their skill in Chivalry. A lower level of Karma lowers the amount of healing but a higher skill level in Chivalry will raise the amount.

The Consecrate Weapon ability allows the Paladin to temporarily imbue the weapon he is holding with holy magic.

The result is a weapon that deals damage of a type equal to the target’s worst resistance. In other words, if a consecrated weapon attacks a Fire Elemental, whose worst resistance is to cold, each hit with the Consecrated Weapon will deal cold damage to that fire elemental.

The duration of the effect is based off of the Paladin's level of Karma and Chivalry skill. Lower Karma will shorten the effect, but higher Chivalry skill will lengthen the effect.

The Dispel Evil Paladin ability affects a small area around the Paladin. Any evil creatures that come into the affected area may be destroyed or repelled, causing them to flee from combat. This ability targets evil summoned creatures as well as non-summoned evil creatures.

Dispel Evil can also target player Necromancers that are under effect of the Wraith Form spell. The ability will cause transformed Necromancers to suffer some amount of Mana and Stamina loss.

The chance for successful use of this ability is modified by the Paladin's level of Karma and Chivalry skill. While lower Karma will decrease the effectiveness of this ability, higher skill in Chivalry will increase it's effectiveness.

The Paladin’s Divine Fury ability allows him to wage a raging battle against the forces of evil, causing him to swing faster, hit better, and do more damage. While under the effect of this Holy Fury, the Paladin's ability to defend himself is severely lowered.

In order to commit himself to the proper state of mind for this ability, the Paladin must be at full mana.

The Enemy of One Paladin ability causes the next creature the Paladin strikes to become his “mortal enemy”. For the duration of the effect, whenever the Paladin strikes a creature that is his sworn “mortal enemy”, his damage is greatly increased.

Because the Paladin is so completely focused on a specific enemy type, however, all other creature types will have their damage against the Paladin increased when they strike him.

The Paladin’s Holy Light ability is the only direct-damage ability that the Paladin possesses. Calling on the powers of his faith, he may call forth a magnificent beacon of holy light which damages all enemies in a small radius around the caster.

The Paladin’s Noble Sacrifice ability allows him to sacrifice himself for the greater good of those in the area. When the ability is used, the Paladin is taken down to one (1) Hit Point, one (1) Stamina, and one (1) Mana.

In response to the Paladin's sacrifice, all of the dead in the affected area are offered resurrection, while all of the living are Cured and Healed.

The Paladin’s Remove Curse ability allows him to remove all Curse type effects from a single target. Curses include all Necromancer curses, as well as the spells Feeblemind, Clumsy, Weaken, and Paralyze.

The Paladin ability Sacred Journey mimics the mage spell of Recall almost exactly, in that it allows a Paladin to instantly travel to any location for which he has a marked runa.

The Paladin cannot take a Sacred Journey if he is targeting or is being targeted by any creature, or is in combat.

Tithing points are gained by tithing gold to the Virtue Shrines. A Paladin who tithes gold to the shrine is making manifest his devotion to the concepts and beliefs that the Shrines exemplify.

Once gained through an act of tithing, these 'points' may be used by the Paladin to summon the divine abilities granted to his class.

Each use of a Paladin Ability consumes Tithing Points in addition to the pure energy of Mana.

Players may tithe gold to the Virtue Shrines by opening the context sensitive menu interface on the shrine's Ankh. There they may choose the Tithe Gold option, which will bring up the Tithing Interface. The Tithing Interface lists the amount of gold the player is currently holding. The player may then use the four arrows to convert Gold into Tithing points and vice versa.

When the OK button is clicked, the player's tithed Gold will be converted into the listed amount of Tithing Points.

The Paladin has many special abilities he can call forth through the use of his Book of Chivalry.

The Book Of Chivalry can be thought of as the Paladin's spell book. To use an ability, simply open the Book of Chivalry to the appropriate page and double click the icon of the ability you wish to activate

The following abilities are available to the Paladin at various points of his development:

* Cleanse by Fire
* Close Wounds
* Consecreate Weapon
* Dispel Evil
* Divine Fury
* Enemy of One
* Holy Light
* Noble Sacrifice
* Remove Curse
* Sacred Journey

Paladins are the holy warriors of the realm who have dedicated themselves as protectors of the virtues and vanquishers of all that is evil.

Paladins have several special abilities that are not available to the ordinary warrior. Due to the spiritual nature of these abilities, the Paladin requires some amount of mana to activate them. In addition to mana, the Paladin is also required to spend a certain amount of tithing points each time a special ability is used.

Tithing points and mana are automatically consumed when a special Paladin ability is activated. All Paladin abilities are activated through the Book of Chivalry

Now that you are ready, let me give you your first task.

As I mentioned earlier, we have been trying to fight back the wicked Horde Minions which have recently begun attacking our cities - but to no avail. Our need is great!

Your first task will be to assess the situation in the mountain pass, and help our troops defeat the Horde Minions there.

Take the road marked with glowing runes, that starts just outside of this mansion. Before you go into battle, it would be prudent to review combat techniques as well as information on healing yourself, using your Paladin ability 'Close Wounds'.

To aid you in your fight, you may also wish to purchase equipment from Frank the Blacksmith, who is standing just South of here.

Good luck young Paladin!

Karma is closely related to the effectiveness of Paladin abilities. In short, the higher your level of Karma is, the more effective your Paladin abilities will be. Lower Karma, on the other hand, will decrease the effectiveness of your Paladin abilities.

A Paladin should always strive to follow the virtues, thus naturally increasing his Karma and making him the most powerful Paladin he can be.

You are using a Soulstone. This powerful artifact allows you to remove skill points from your character and store them in the stone for later retrieval. In order to use the stone, you must make sure your Skill Lock for the indicated skill is pointed downward. Click the "Skills" button on your Paperdoll to access the Skill List, and double-check your skill lock.

Once you activate the stone, all skill points in the indicated skill will be removed from your character. These skill points can later be retrieved. IMPORTANT: When retrieving skill points from a Soulstone, the Soulstone WILL REPLACE any existing skill points already on your character!

This is an Account Bound Soulstone. Skill points stored inside can be retrieved by any character on the same account as the character who placed them into the stone.

Kowal zajmuje sie znajdowaniem i wydobywaniem rudy, ktora nastepnie przetapia na sztaby aby w koncu wykuc zbroje i orez. Od czasu do czasu zdarza mu sie udac na niebezpieczna wyprawe. Wybierajac ta postac otrzymujesz status (mlody).

Immobilizes the Target for a brief amount of time.  The Target’s Resisting Spells skill affects the Duration of the immobilization.

Summons a random creature as a Pet for a limited duration.  The strength of the summoned creature is based off of the Caster’s Magia skill.

Casts the Curse spell on a Target, and any creatures within a two tile radius.
Conjures a field of paralyzing energy that affects any creature that enters it with the effects of the Paralyze spell.
Reveals the presence of any invisible or hiding creatures or players within a radius around the targeted tile.
Damages nearby targets with a series of lightning bolts that deal Energy damage.
Conjures a temporary field of energy on the ground at the Target Location that blocks all movement.
Envelopes the target in a column of magical flame the deals Fire damage.
Targeting a rune marked with the Mark spell opens a temporary portal to the rune’s marked location.  The portal can be used by anyone to travel to that location.
Drains mana from the Target and transfers it to the Caster. The amount of mana drained is determined by a comparison between the Caster’s Madrosc skill and the Target’s Resisting Spells skill
Attempts to dispel any summoned creature within an eight tile radius.
Summons a swarm of fiery meteors that strike all targets within a radius around the Target Location.  The total Fire damage dealt is split between all Targets of the spell.
Temporarily transforms the Caster into a creature selected from a specified list.  While polymorphed, other players will see the Caster as a criminal.
Causes a violent shaking of the earth that damages all nearby creatures and characters.
Summons a spinning mass of energy that selects a Target to attack based off of its intelligence and proximity.  The Energy Vortex disappears after a set amount of time. Requires 1 pet control slot.
Resurrects a player’s ghost.  Cannot be used on NPCs or monsters.

Animates the Targeted corpse, creating a mindless, wandering undead.  The strength of the risen undead is greatly modified by the Fame of the original creature.
Temporarily creates a dark pact between the Caster and the Target.  Any damage dealt by the Target to the Caster is increased, but the Target receives the same amount of damage.

Transmogrifies the flesh of the Target creature or player to resemble rotted corpse flesh, making them more vulnerable to Fire and Poison damage, but increasing their Resistance to Physical and Cold damage.
Temporarily imbues a weapon with a life draining effect.
Curses the Target so that the next harmful event that affects them is magnified.

Transforms the Caster into a horrific demonic beast, which deals more damage, and recovers hit points faster, but can no longer cast any spells except for Necromancer Transformation spells.  Caster remains in this form until they recast the Horrific Beast spell.

Transforms the Caster into a lich, increasing their mana regeneration and some Resistances, while lowering their Fire Resist and slowly sapping their life.  Caster remains in this form until they recast the Lich Form spell.

Attempts to place a curse on the Target that increases the mana cost of any spells they cast, for a duration based off a comparison between the Caster’s Rozmowa z Duchami skill and the Target’s Resisting Spells skill.

Temporarily causes intense physical pain to the Target, dealing Direct damage.  Once the spell wears off, if the Target is still alive, some of the Hit Points lost through the Pain Spike are restored.

Creates a blast of poisonous energy centered on the Target.  The main Target is inflicted with a large amount of Poison damage, and all valid Targets in a radius around the main Target are inflicted with a lesser effect.

Temporarily chokes off the air supply of the Target with poisonous fumes.  The Target is inflicted with Poison damage over time. The amount of damage dealt each “hit” is based off of the Caster’s Rozmowa z Duchami skill and the Target’s current Stamina.

Allows the Caster to summon a Familiar from a selected list. A Familiar will follow and fight with its owner, in addition to granting unique bonuses to the Caster, dependent upon the type of Familiar summoned.

Transforms the Caster into a powerful Vampire, which increases his Stamina and Mana regeneration while lowering his Fire Resistance.  Vampires also perform Life Drain when striking their enemies. Caster remains in this form until they recast the Vampiric Embrace spell.

Summons a vile Spirit which haunts the Target until either the Target or the Spirit is dead.  Vengeful Spirits have the ability to track down their Targets wherever they may travel.  A Spirit’s strength is determined by the Necromancy and Rozmowa z Duchami skills of the Caster.
Creates a withering frost around the Caster, which deals Cold Damage to all valid targets in a radius.

Transforms the Caster into an ethereal Wraith, lowering some Elemental Resists, while increasing their Physical resist.  Wraith Form also allows the caster to always succeed when using the Recall spell, and causes a Mana Drain effect when hitting enemies. Caster remains in this form until they recast the Wraith Form spell.

Forcibly relocates player ghosts caught within the spell's area of effect if the ghost does not have a nearby corpse.  The spell is only effective in Champion regions, and has no effect upon members of the same party, guild, alliance, or faction.
Cures the target of poisons, but causes the caster to be burned by fire damage. The amount of fire damage is lessened if the caster has high Karma.
Heals the target of damage.  The caster’s Karma affects the amount of damage healed.

Temporarily enchants the weapon the caster is currently wielding.  The type of damage the weapon inflicts when hitting a target will be converted to the target’s worst Resistance type. Duration of the effect is affected by the caster’s Karma.

Attempts to dispel evil summoned creatures and cause other evil creatures to flee from combat.  Transformed Necromancers may also take Stamina and Mana Damage.  Caster’s Karma and Chivalry, and Target’s Fame or Necromancy affect Dispel chance.

Temporarily increases the Paladin’s swing speed, chance to hit, and damage dealt, while lowering the Paladin’s defenses.  Upon casting, the Paladin’s Stamina is also refreshed. Duration of the spell is affected by Caster’s Karma.

The next target hit becomes the Paladin’s Mortal Enemy.  All damage dealt to that exact creature type is increased, but the Paladin takes extra damage from all other creature types. Mortal Enemy creature types will highlight Orange to the Paladin.  Duration of the spell is affected by the Caster’s Karma.

Attempts to remove all Curse effects from Target. Curses include Mage spells such as Clumsy, Weaken, Feeblemind, and Paralyze, as well as all Necromancer curses. Chance of removing curse is affected by the Caster’s Karma.

The Animate Dead spell allows the Necromancer to animate the corpses of dead creatures, creating mindless, wandering undead.

The type of undead created from this spell is dependent on both the Necromancer's skill in Rozmowa z Duchami and Necromancy, as well as the type of creature and its fame when it was alive.

This spell summons an evil familiar to the caster's side.

The caster may only have 1 familiar at a time, and they count towards a player's Follower limit. When a caster has summoned a particular type of familiar, the caster gains some special abilities:

- Horde Minion
- Shadow Wisp
- Dark Wolf
- Death Adder
- Vampire Bat

The Book of Chivalry, used by Paladins, is akin to the mage's spellbook. Within the Book of Chivalry are icons used to activate the Paladin's special abilities. In addition, the Paladin can also inspect the requirements and effects of each ability within the Book of Chivalry.

Books of Chivalry can be purchased
Any new character starting with points in Chivalry skill, will find a Book of Chivalry in their pack upon entering the world.

The Paladin ability Sacred Journey mimics the effect of the mage spell of Recall almost exactly, in that it can transport the Paladin to any location to which he or she possesses a marked rune.

Successful use of this ability consumes Tithing points as well as mana. The chance to succeed is based on Chivalry skill.

Close Wounds is the basic healing spell for a Paladin. The Paladin uses the ability and then targets the creature he wishes to Heal. The amount of Hit Points healed depends on the paladin’s Karma & Chivalry.
If you release your familiar, everything in its backpack will be destroyed!  Are you sure you want to release your familiar?

Necromancers are those who have dedicated their lives to bring death, decay and destruction to Britannia by drawing on the powers of death itself.

Those who wield the power of death have at their disposal an impressive array of spells that aims to bring a gruesome and horrific end to anything that comes between the Necromancer and complete power.

In addition, Necromancers also make excellent melee warriors since any necromantic spell can be cast whilst wielding a weapon (unlike spells of conventional magery).

The spells of Necromancy may be cast by those who have sufficient skill in Necromancy. All necromantic spells have a mana and reagent cost attached to them. Necromancy is a good compliment to the evil warrior, as all necromantic spells can be cast whilst wielding a weapon.

The Spells

-Animate Dead
-Blood Oath
-Corpse Skin
-Curse Weapon
-Evil Omen
-Horrific Beast
-Lich Form
-Mind Rot
-Pain Spike
-Poison Strike
-Strangle
-Summon Familiar
-Vampiric Embrace
-Vengeful Spirit
-Wither
-Wraith Form

The Rozmowa z Duchami skill is used to heal yourself by channeling spiritual energy. Spiritual energy may be channeled from either a corpse or the person using the skill. If a corpse is not available, then the user will channel their own energy, effectively trading mana for hit points.

The amount of damage healed depends on the amount of residual spirit energy that still lies within the corpse.

If you are leaving the tower, you should learn about the Radar Map.

The Radar Map (or Overhead View) can be opened by pressing 'ALT-R' on your keyboard. It shows your immediate surroundings from a bird's eye view.

Pressing ALT-R twice, will enlarge the Radar Map a little. Use the Radar Map often as you travel throughout the world to familiarize yourself with your surroundings.

Does Direct Damage to the Target based on the difference between their current Hit Points and Mana.  The greater the difference, the more Damage they receive.

Send two arrows flying at your opponent if you're mounted.

Strike your opponent with great force, partially bypassing their armor and inflicting greater damage.
Requires either Bushido or Ninjitsu skill, depending on the weapon.
The warrior becomes one with their weapon, allowing it to guide their hand.  The effects of this attack are unpredictable, but effective.
The archer focuses their will into an arrow of pure force, dazing their enemy.  Dazed enemies are temporarily easier to hit, and sometimes forget who they are attacking.
A charged arrow that arcs lightning into its target's allies.

Fires a snake at the target, poisoning them in addition to normal damage with a successful hit.  The archer must be skilled in poisoning and nimble of hand to achieve success.

Enfuses the attacker with Nature's Fury, granting them unparalleled strength.  This dangerous channeling causes leafy vines to violently erupt from beneath the attacker's skin, dealing substantial physical and poison damage to them.
