The Journal of Dr. Spector - Collection III
The Journal of Dr. Spector - Collection IV

Week 6

The Kurak may be the rivals of the Barako tribe, but I did not feel any hostility directed at me. While they are proud of their tiger totem and the animal they emulate, they were not as cruel as these predator cats. I did manage to see a demonstration of the strange claws they use for hunting and combat, and I am glad I stayed on their good side. I learned about a strange ruin they avoid, something to do with their ancestors. It is to the east. I plan to visit it after I meet with the final tribe of Eodon at 40 South 41 West.

Week 7

The Jukari live among the lava flows in the shadow of a great volcanic range that blocks travel to the southeast. The tribe uses the fire and obsidian shards produced by the volcano as their weapons, believing these to be gifts from the spirits. I asked if any had traveled into the volcanic range, and they mentioned that one of their greatest chieftains walked into the mountains with a sacred hide that protected him from the volcano's poisonous gases. I don't believe the answers I seek can be found within the volcano. That leaves only the pyramid at 20South 58 West.

Week 8

I have explored every ruin I have come across and spoken with all of the tribes. None can help me return through the Ethereal Void to my home. The cracked Moonstone I used to travel did not come with me, and unless I can find another one, I will be trapped here. From the ruins and people, I have learned a bit about various Eodon spirits in my time here:
Aphazz, spirit of emotion and strength
Motazz, spirit of battle
Heluzz, spirit of knowledge and visions
Fabozz, spirit of nature and animals
Kukuzz, spirit of healing
What is strange is that the Pyramid does not show the symbols or images of any of these spirits. It is almost as if someone or something else built it. I must investigate further. I hope to find some way to the lower chambers of the Pyramid.

Week 9

In my travels around Eodon, I heard stories of the city of the World-Builders. While the passage at the top of the Pyramid was sealed, I found a crack near the base of the structure. As I shimmied into the narrow tunnel, I disturbed a stone that was holding up a wall. While I was able to avoid injury, the collapse blocked my way out of the Pyramid. With only a single torch, I started my exploration of the lost city. The city was filled with the bones and dried remains of different creatures. I recognized human and Myrmidex remains, but in all my time in Eodon, I saw nothing that matches the bipedal reptile skeletons in the tunnels. Are these what remain of the World-Builders? In the entire ruined city, only one large crystal had not been smashed when the city fell. The vibrant crystal gave off a shifting spectrum of light, and the air around it was charged with energy. It was hypnotic, and with no other choice, I put my hand against it. The light of the crystal became brighter and brighter. Even when my hand started to burn, I could not pull myself away. I heard a voice in my mind, speaking rapidly in a strange language. As I lost consciousness, one word stuck in my mind: Zipactriotl. I woke in a burning jungle clearing. Around me were dead or dying Myrmidex, and my hands were burning with a strange blue flame. I did not remember slaughtering those creatures, but I knew I had. The tribes had a saying, 'Killing one Myrmidex brings the wrath of its thousand kin.' How much wrath have I earned by killing so many?

Week 10

I am different now. My bones have reshaped themselves, and my skin is like armor. There is a charge of energy around me, constantly buzzing in my ears. I am blacking out more and more, and I am losing more and more of myself. With the changes, hidden parts of the city now allow me access. I have found what appears to be a sort of stasis chamber. I will put myself inside and hope someone can help me.
History of the Great Work I
History of the Great Work II
History of the Great Work III
History of the Great Work IV

The Great Moonstone and the Destruction of the First Home

Spoken by the Memory of Katalkotl

Transcribed by Professor Ellie Rafkin

Eodon was not the cradle of the Kotl. Before, there was Akaktolan, the First Home. While much is forgotten, it was there where the Kotl learned the fundamentals of magic and lore. The First Home was struck by a great meteorite, and the world slipped into an ice age. Those Kotl who survived traveled across the wastes, seeking the source of their suffering. In the center of a huge crater, they found a large tenebrous moonstone. The blackrock artifact bent the very shadows around it. All the Kotl recognized the raw magic before them. Some shunned the moonstone, turning and walking back into the cold, never to be seen again. They were the Mixkotl, the Lost. The rest remained with the moonstone, hoping to unlock its secrets before the end came. In the frozen crater, each day of study claimed another life, but eventually, the Kotl learned to wield the moonstone's power. They used it to grasp and manipulate frayed threads of existence. They knit together pieces from before the First Home's destruction into a new world - Eodon. Eodon presented refuge from the cold desolation Akaktolan had become, so the Kotl stepped across the threshold into the new reality. When they left, they took the Great Moonstone with them, thus closing the door to the First Home forever.

The Founding of Kotlan and the Myrmidex

Spoken by the Memory of Katalkotl

Transcribed by Professor Ellie Rafkin

While the valley of Eodon was warm and filled with bountiful life and food, it was still untamed and wild. The Kotl wished to rebuild their civilization, so they bored into the earth to tap veins of iron and gold. These tunnels became the oldest parts of their city, running for miles under Eodon. To help with the work, they constructed huge golden golems. Powered by the Great Moonstone, the Kotl automatons were tireless workers. Soon, the city of Kotlan was a shining marvel at the heart of Eodon. After the city was completed, the Kotl settled into a life made easier by the magic of the moonstone. However, they wished to be free of all toil. They could never construct or empower enough automatons to take care of every task in the city, so they searched for new servants. Finding no intelligent creatures in the world, they decided to create a servitor race. Using the Nowlotl crystal to tap into the moonstone's power and select distant future variations, the Kotl bred such servants from ants. The Myrmidex were this failed experiment. The Kotl thought that the Myrmidex might inherit the industrious nature of the ants, but instead, they gained only the ants, warlike nature. The Myrmidex broke free of their captivity and fled the city of the Kotl. Thus, the World-Builders were forced to look elsewhere for their labor.

The Worldwalker and Humanity

Spoken by the Memory of Katalkotl

Transcribed by Professor Ellie Rafkin

After the failure of the Myrmidex, the Kotl took more care in their manipulation of living things. They turned the power of the moonstone outward beyond Eodon. They constructed the Moon Chamber as a focal point for all of Eodon's mana. The artificial origin of Eodon made travel across the void between worlds difficult. However, with the awesome power of the Great Moonstone, it was possible. The Kotl sent their bravest general out across the Ethereal Void: Katalkotl the Worldwalker. He and his warriors traveled to dozens of worlds, bringing treasures and curiosities back to Eodon. Eventually, Katalkotl found several worlds with an intelligent, but less civilized, species called humans. With unrivalled magic and martial power, Katalkotl's forces brought back humans to be servants to the Kotl. Because of the mercurial connection between Eodon and the outer worlds, the humans were from many different times and places. Since the Kotl language could not be spoken by the human voice box (and so the Kotl could keep the secrets of their power), the Kotl created a single language from various human tongues to communicate with their new servants. Out of awe and fear, most of the humans revered and served the World-Builders without complaint. Those of Wyjatkowej jakosci courage and honor even served as defenders of Kotlan. Still some humans rebelled against servitude. Many managed to flee the city of the Kotl. Some tried to resist openly and directly, only to be stopped by the automatons. A few succeeded in undermining the rulers of Eodon in secret.

The Fall of the World-Builders

Spoken by the Memory of Katalkotl

Transcribed by Professor Ellie Rafkin

Initially, the Kotl viewed the escaped Myrmidex as a minor nuisance, like any other beast of Eodon. The Myrmidex should have been no threat to the Kotl, who protected their settlements with energy fields powered by the Great Moonstone. Still, the Myrmidex were persistent in their aggression. Eventually, the Kotl began planning to exterminate the ant hybrids. The Kotl attempted to grow a new version of the Myrmidex, hoping to breed passivity into the species. They planned to send empowered humans directly against the insects. The first of these was called Zipactriotl. While the weapon initially killed a countless number of the insects, the human mind inside grew dangerously unstable. Still, it was believed that beyond a few scattered insects in the wilds of Eodon, the species was extinct. Unfortunately, the Myrmidex queen had simply gone into hiding. In a subterranean hive, she produced a million eggs that hatched into an army. The intelligent insects had studied the Kotl and knew the source of their power. Mysteriously, the Myrmidex raided inside Kotlan and stole the Great Moonstone. If this initial strike disarmed the Kotl, the Myrmidex then proceeded to break the back of Kotl civilization. The surface portions of Kotlan were destroyed, so the World-Builders barricaded themselves in the city's tunnels. Expecting to withstand the Myrmidex for months, the Kotl found themselves facing the Myrmidex in days. The insects destroyed everything in their path: every crystal, every relic, and any trace of Kotl magic. The Myrmidex killed everyone in the city, Kotl and human. Then the Myrmidex left, and the city closed up behind them.

Otrzymaj wzmocniony kilof. Ten kilof ma 150 lub 200 uzyc na poczatku, losowo okreslanych podczas otrzymywania nagrody.

Otrzymaj skorzane gornicze rekawice. Te rekawice zwiekszaja gornictwo o 1,0 punktu gdy sa ubrane i wystepuja w jednym z osmiu specjalnych odcieni rudy. Wszystkie rekawice gornicze moga podniesc umiejetnosc gornicza gracza ponad 100 umiejetnosci.

Otrzymaj cwiekowane gornicze rekawice. Te rekawice zwiekszaja gornictwo o 3,0 punkty gdy sa ubrane i wystepuja w jednym z osmiu specjalnych odcieni rudy. Wszystkie rekawice gornicze moga podniesc umiejetnosc gornicza gracza ponad 100 umiejetnosci.

Otrzymaj pierscienicowe gornicze rekawice. Te rekawice zwiekszaja gornictwo o 5,0 punktow gdy sa ubrane i wystepuja w jednym z osmiu specjalnych odcieni rudy. Wszystkie rekawice gornicze moga podniesc umiejetnosc gornicza gracza ponad 100 umiejetnosci.

Otrzymaj kilof gargulcowy. Ma od 101 do 125 uzyc. Pozwala gornikowi zwiekszyc poziom rudy o jeden, pod warunkiem, ze gornik ma wymagana umiejetnosc do wydobywania wyzszej rudy. Ten efekt mozna stosowac z efektem uzyskanym poprzez uzycie narzedzia poszukiwacza zloz. Uwaga: Uzycie gargulcowego kilofa moze spowodowac przyzwanie wrogo nastawionego zywiolaka rudy, niezaleznie od poziomu umiejetnosci gornictwa gracza!

Otrzymaj narzedzie poszukiwacza. To narzedzie pozwala gornikowi zwiekszyc poziom rudy o jeden, pod warunkiem, ze gornik ma wymagana umiejetnosc do wydobywania lepszej rudy. Narzedzie to ma 50 uzyc na poczatku i mozna je uzyc razem z kilofem gargulcowym, aby podniesc poziom rudy o dwa poziomy (np. miejsce na agapit pozwala na wydobycie valorytu).
Otrzymaj proszek wzmocnienia. Ten proszek zwiekszy maksymalna wytrzymalosc broni i zbroi o dziesiec punktow na uzycie. Proszek ten ma 10 uzyc na poczatku.
Otrzymaj runiczny mlotek z matowej miedzi. Ten mlotek mozna uzyc do kucia broni i zbroi o wlasciwosciach magicznych
Otrzymaj runiczny mlotek z mrocznego metalu. Ten mlotek mozna uzyc do kucia broni i zbroi o wlasciwosciach magicznych

Otrzymaj runiczny mlotek z valorytu. Ten mlotek mozna uzyc do kucia broni i zbroi o wlasciwosciach magicznych
Otrzymaj kowadlo o odpowiednim odcieniu. To kowadlo jest dekoracyjnym przedmiotem, ktory wystepuje w jednym z osmiu specjalnych odcieni rudy

Ten mlotek ma 600 uzyc.

Otrzymaj stos zabarwionej zlozonej tkaniny. Ta tkanina wystepuje w czterech odcieniach, ktore normalnie nie sa dostepne. Kazdy stos zawiera sto tkanin.
Otrzymaj pare sandalow w zabarwieniu. Sandaly sa zabarwione losowo jednym z osmiu kolorow z czwartego lub piatego poziomu grupy tkanin. Sandaly nie posiadaja innych wlasciwosci.
Otrzymaj dekoracyjna rozciagniete skore. Zwoj malej lub sredniej rozciagnietej skory i moze byc zwrocone na poludnie lub wschod. Wszystko losowo okreslone w momencie otrzymania nagrody.

Otrzymaj dekoracyjna kwiatowa tapeta. Bedzie to albo tapeta z kwiatami, albo ciemna tapeta z kwiatami i moze byc zwrocona na poludnie lub wschod. Wszystko losowo okreslone w momencie otrzymania nagrody.

Otrzymaj dekoracyjny futrzany dywan z niedzwiedzia. Zwoj dla brazowego dywanu niedzwiedzia, albo dywanu z polarnego niedzwiedzia i moze byc zwrocony albo na poludne, albo wschod. Wszystko losowo okreslone w momencie otrzymania nagrody.

Otrzymaj zwoj poblogoslawienia ubran. Ten zwoj pozwoli uzytkownikowi ,,blogoslawic" jeden element odziezy. Ten poblogoslawiony przedmiot nie moze zostac skradziony i pozostanie z toba nawet w przypadku smierci. Zwoj jest zuzywany przy uzyciu.

Ten fartuch wystepuje w roznych odcieniach, ktore normalnie nie sa dostepne.
Ta beczka do fermentacji moze byc uzywana do tworzenia roznych win poprzez fermentacje owocow.
Nie mozesz otworzyc beczki, gdy juz rozpoczela sie fermentacja!
Czy na pewno chcesz zakonczyc proces fermentacji? Caly postep i materialy zostana utracone!
Nie mozesz zmienic nazwy wina, gdy proces fermentacji juz sie rozpoczal.
Czy na pewno chcesz rozpoczac proces fermentacji?
Proces fermentacji nie zostal jeszcze rozpoczety.
Mozesz umiescic w beczkowniku fermentacyjnym tylko jeden rodzaj owocu naraz. Najpierw oproznij beczke.
Nie mozesz dodawac niczego do beczkownika fermentacyjnego po rozpoczeciu fermentacji.
beczka do fermentacji nie jest pusty. Najpierw go oproznij, aby dodac owoce i drozdze.
Mozesz umieszczac w beczkowniku fermentacyjnym tylko owoce i drozdze.
Nie masz wystarczajaco duzo owocow ani drozdzy, aby rozpoczac fermentacje.
*Delikatnie probujesz fermentacji... jest zepsuta! Powinienes prawdopodobnie oproznic beczke*

Ho ho ho! Pan dostarczyl prezenty dla tych, ktorzy byli grzeczni! Skorzystaj z worka z prezentami, aby odebrac swoja nagrode. Mozna to zrobic w miescie!
Swiety Mikolaj dziekuje za twoje wysilki podczas festiwalu Rzemiosla, ale nie zakwalifikowales sie do nagrody. Sprobuj ponownie w nastepnym miescie!
Juz odebrales swoja nagrode z festiwalu Rzemiosla.

Ho! Ho! Ho-llo! Festiwal Rzemiosla to wydarzenie ograniczone czasowo, ktore odbywa sie w grudniu! Swiety Mikolaj potrzebuje twojej pomocy, aby wytworzyc wystarczajaca ilosc zabawek dla calym Nelderim i nie tylko! Zabawki nie sa tanie, podobnie jak elfy *usmiecha sie*, wiec musimy siegnac do Skarbu Miasta, aby sfinansowac festiwal. Skarb Miasta musi miec co najmniej 1 milion zlota... co? Przeciez to nie platyna ani nic takiego *smieje sie*... aby festiwal sie rozpoczal. Wykonuj i dostarcz mi Kontraktowe Zlecenia Hurtowe, abysmy mogli miec najwieksze i najlepsze drzewo, aby swietowac sezon swiateczny! Jak widzisz, teraz troche brakuje nam drzew, wiec dostarcz mi ukonczone Kontraktowe Zlecenia Hurtowe, aby drzewo roslo dzieki Swiatecznej Magii! A oto najlepsza czesc - Im wiecej Kontraktowych Zlecen Hurtowych mi dostarczysz, tym wiecej prezentow Swiety Mikolaj wlozy do magicznego worka z zabawkami, ktory mi daje! Daj mi wystarczajaco duzo Kontraktowych Zlecen Hurtowych, a bedziemy miec OGROMNE drzewo z ozdobami, swiatlami, a nawet GWIAZDA na szczycie! Jesli nam sie uda, Swiety Mikolaj upewni sie, ze KAZDY uczestnik festiwalu dostanie prezent, nawet jesli byl troche niegrzeczny! Kazdy festiwal trwa tylko trzy dni w kazdym miescie, wiec upewnij sie, ze dostarczasz mi te Kontraktowe Zlecenia Hurtowe, abysmy mogli zobaczyc, jak nasze drzewo rosnie! Czy wspomnialem, ze elfy rowniez lubia smakolyki i ciasteczka? Powodzenia!
Barylka nie moze pomiescic wiecej owocow.

Fermentacja
Dodaj owoce i drozdze do beczki i rozpocznij proces fermentacji.
Fermentacja trwa 24 godziny i wyprodukuje 1 butelke na kazde 4 owoce. Sukces jest okreslany przez odpornosc bakteryjna drozdzy oraz Twoje Umiejetnosci Alchemii i Gotowania.
Mozna fermentowac nastepujace owoce: Winogrona, Jablka, Brzoskwinie, Gruszki i Sliwki.
Twoj cel jest obecnie odporny na zlamania kosci!

Twoje kosci sa zlamane! Wyciek wytrzymalosci z uplywem czasu!

Podstawowy pakiet slubny obejmuje wszystko, co potrzebne do swietowania twojego wyjatkowego dnia! Pakiet zawiera: 1 magiczne nasienie botanicznego luku, ktore mozna wymienic na 1 z 3 botanicznych lukow, 6 stolow koktajlowych, 6 eleganckich krzesel slubnych, 20 zwyklych krzesel slubnych, 10 bukietow stolowych, 4 bukiety stojace, 2 eleganckie swieczniki slubne, 2 zwykle swieczniki slubne, 1 magiczne ciasto, ktore mozna wymienic na 1 z 8 tortow slubnych, 1 fontanne czekoladowa, 2 magiczne zestawy slubne, ktore mozna wymienic na zestaw dla panny mlodej lub pana mlodego (zawiera suknie slubna, smoking i ozdobniki do tortu), 2 krotkie prawa stolu bufetowego i 1 dlugie prawa stolu bufetowego.

Czy twoje plany slubne wymagaja zakwaterowania dla dodatkowych gosci? Pakiet dodatkowy slubny obejmuje 4 stoly koktajlowe, 4 eleganckie krzesla slubne, 10 zwyklych krzesel slubnych, 6 bukietow stolowych, 2 bukiety stojace, 1 elegancki swiecznik slubny, 1 zwykly swiecznik slubny, 1 krotki prawy stol bufetowy i 1 dlugi prawy stol bufetowy.

Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Nekromancji. Stworzenie musi miec negatywna karme.

Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Archanicznej Piromancji, polaczenie Nekromancji i Magii, ktore wykorzystuje moc ognia.

Trenuje stworzenie w uderzeniu nerwowym, ignorowaniu pancerza i rozbrajaniu ruchami specjalnymi. Dodatkowo trenuje stworzenie w Ostrym Oku i Nawalach atakow.
Trenuje stworzenie w rozbrajaniu i paralizowaniu ruchami specjalnymi. Dodatkowo trenuje stworzenie w Gluchej walce i Rozpedzaniu.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Zafalszowania Run, powodujac redukcje odpornosci na obrazenia celu. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Zlapanego Pazura, powodujac, ze stworzenie uzyje swoich pazurow do rozszarpywania celu, powodujac utrate odpornosci fizycznej i obrazen fizycznych. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Zimnego Wiatru, powodujac, ze stworzenie oddycha mroznym wiatrem wokol celow, co powoduje obrazenia od zimna w czasie. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Wscieklego Oddechu, powodujac, ze stworzenie uzyje ognistego oddechu zadajac wybuchowe obrazenia ogniowe, ktore utrzymuja sie przez pewien czas. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Prowadzacego Wyladowania, powodujac redukcje odpornosci energetycznej celu. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Blyskawicznej Sily, powodujac atak stworzenia z obrazeniami energetycznymi i szansa na ogluszenie. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Wyciagania Zycia, powodujac atak stworzenia z obrazeniami energetycznymi, ktore przeksztalcaja czesc tych obrazen z powrotem w zdrowie w czasie. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Zlego Ognia, powodujac, ze stworzenie wykonuje dewastujace ataki ogniem. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Ognistego Oddechu Smoka, powodujac, ze stworzenie wykonuje dewastujace obrazenia ogniem, oparte na zdrowiu celu. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Inferna, powodujac, ze stworzenie otacza swoje cele ogniem, powodujac redukcje odpornosci na ogien i dewastacyjne obrazenia ogniem. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Sily Zmierzchu, powodujac, ze stworzenie atakuje seria uderzen, zmniejszajac odpornosc fizyczna celu i powodujac obrazenia fizyczne. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Zachlannego Gryzu, powodujac, ze stworzenie zadaje wrzaskliwa rane na zblizajacych sie celach, co powoduje bezposrednie obrazenia w czasie. Koszt many 20.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Palacych Ran, powodujac, ze stworzenie oparza atakujacych, skutkujac redukcja efektu leczenia. Koszt many 25.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Wypompowywania Zycia, powodujac, ze stworzenie wyssie zycie z naplywajacych obrazen. Koszt many 5.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Lepkiej Skory, powodujac, ze predkosc ataku napastnikow zostanie zmniejszona. Koszt many 5.

Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Uderzenia Ogonem, powodujac, ze stworzenie macha ogonem w kierunku celow, co skutkuje bezposrednimi obrazeniami oraz szansa na paraliz i dezorientacje, co skutkuje zmniejszeniem inteligencji i zrecznosci. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Trujacego Gryzu, powodujac, ze stworzenie zatruwa wszystkie pobliskie cele. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Odplywu Many, powodujac, ze stworzenie wypompowuje mane wszystkich pobliskich celow. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w mocy Odpychania, powodujac, ze wszelkie naplywajace obrazenia zostana odbite w kierunku atakujacego. Koszt many 30.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Uderzenia Nerwu, powodujac paraliz i bezposrednie obrazenia celu.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Ataku Wiru, powodujac obrazenia wszystkim pobliskim celom.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Strzalu Blyskawicy, powodujac obrazenia energetyczne wszystkim pobliskim celom.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Rzucajacego Infuzja, powodujac zrzut lub paraliz i dodatkowe obrazenia.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Tajemniczej Arki, powodujac dodatkowe obrazenia chaosu wszystkim pobliskim celom.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Uderzenia Szponu, powodujac dodatkowe obrazenia i zmniejszajac regeneracje punktow zycia celu.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Ataku Psychicznego, powodujac obrazenia fizyczne i zmniejszajac inteligencje celu, zwiekszajac obrazenia od zaklec i obnizajac koszt many.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Ignorowania Pancerza, ktory ignoruje odpornosci celu, jednoczesnie zadajac nieco mniejsze obrazenia.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Przebijania Pancerza, powodujac zwiekszone obrazenia, jednoczesnie ignorujac czesc odpornosci celu na obrazenia.

Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Plecenia Ostrza, pozwalajac na uzycie losowo wybranych ruchow specjalnych, w tym: krwawienie, ignorowanie pancerza, blok, smiertelny cios, udawany ruch, paralizujacy cios i miazdzacy cios.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Krwawienia, powodujac krwawienie celu, ktore zadaje obrazenia w czasie.
Uczy stwora specjalnego ruchu Blok, zwiekszajac na pewien czas szanse na obrone.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Cios Wstrzasowy, zadajac celowi bezposrednie obrazenia i wysysajac z niego mane.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Miazdzacy Cios, zadajac dodatkowe obrazenia celowi.
Trenuje istote w specjalnym ruchu Rozbrojenia, powodujac, ze cel odbezpiecza swoja bron.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Dismount, powodujac, ze stworzenie zsiada z celu.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Podwojne Uderzenie, powodujac podwojne ataki, ale ze zmniejszonymi obrazeniami.
Trenuje stworzenie w specjalnym ruchu Powdojne Dzierzenie, zwiekszajac jego predkosc zamachu.
Trenuje stworzenie w specjalnym ruchu Zwod, powodujac zmniejszenie otrzymywanych obrazen.
Trenuje istote w ruchu specjalnym Sila Natury, zadajac obrazenia bezposrednie i zwiekszajac obrazenia nastepnego ataku.
Trenuje stwora w ruchu specjalnym Szalony Wicher, zadajac obrazenia pobliskim celom.  W przeciwienstwie do specjalnego ruchu Szalonego Wichru gracza, atak ten nie ogranicza ruchu pobliskich wrogow.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Smiertelne Uderzenie, sprawiajac, ze cel nie jest w stanie sie uleczyc.
Trenuje stworzenie w ruchu specjalnym Paraliz, powodujacym paraliz celu.
Szkoli istote w zakresie efektu obszarowego Aura Energii, zadajac obrazenia od energii pobliskim celom. Koszt many 20.
Trenuje istote w efekcie obszarowym Burzy Ognia, zadajac obrazenia od ognia pobliskim celom i podpalajac teren..
Szkoli stworzenie w zakresie efektu obszarowego Wybuchowa Maz, powodujac ognista mgielke na pobliskich ofiarach, zadajac im obrazenia od ognia. Koszt many 30.
Szkoli istote w zakresie efektu obszarowego Esencja Ziemi, zadajac obrazenia fizyczne pobliskim celom. Koszt many 20.
Trenuje istote w efekcie obszarowym Aury Mdlosci, powodujac, ze pobliskie cele cierpia na zmniejszenie predkosci obrotu, szansy na trafienie, szansy na obrone i szybsze rzucanie. Koszt many 100.
Szkoli istote w zakresie efektu obszarowego Esencji Choroby, zadajac obrazenia od trucizny pobliskim celom. Koszt many 20.
Trenuje stworzenie w zakresie smiertelnego uderzenia, wstrzasu i rozbrojenia.  Szkoli rowniez istote w umiejetnosciach mistrzowskich Wytrzymalosc i Oszolomienie..
Trenuje istote w zaawansowanym korzystaniu z zaklec magicznych..
Trenuje istote w mocy Nekromancji, bedacej polaczeniem Nekromancji i Magii..
Szkoli istote w zakresie efektu obszarowego Trujacego Oddechu, powodujac smiertelne zatrucie pobliskich celow.  Koszt many 50.
You may not use this while inside a house or on a boat.
A Totem is already active in this area.
Nie masz dostepnych miejsc na zwierzeta, aby wytrenowac tego zwierzaka. Zwolnij miejsce na zwierzaka i sprobuj ponownie.
Nie mozesz wytrenowac swojego zwierzaka. W plecaku glownym nie znaleziono wymaganego zwoju mocy..
Twojemu zwierzeciu brakuje punktow wymaganych do ukonczenia tego szkolenia.
Wyglada na to, ze twoj zwierzak ukonczyl juz ten trening.
Wszystkie szkolenia dla zwierzat sa ostateczne i nie mozna sie ich oduczyc. Czy chcesz ukonczyc to szkolenie?
Rozpoczecie szkolenia tego zwierzaka usunie instynkt watahy. Instynkt stada jest ograniczony do zwierzat z czterema slotami i wiecej. Czy chcesz kontynuowac?
Zwieksza maksymalna liczbe punktow zycia istoty.
Zwieksza naturalny wspolczynnik regeneracji punktow zycia stworzenia.
Zwieksza naturalny wspolczynnik regeneracji wytrzymalosci istoty.
Zwieksza naturalna szybkosc regeneracji many danej istoty.
Zwieksza srednia bazowych obrazen zadawanych przez stworzenie na sekunde.
Zwiekszenie limitu umiejetnosci danej istoty za pomoca zwojow mocy.

Zdolnosc ta wymaga dodatkowych umiejetnosci, ktorych istota jeszcze sie nie nauczyla i bedzie wymagac dodatkowych punktow treningu. Aby nauczyc sie tej umiejetnosci, punkty szkolenia istoty zostana zmniejszone o calkowita liczbe niezbednych punktow szkolenia.
Treserzy zwierzat w calym Nelderim raduja sie! Odkryto nowe techniki tresury zwierzat!  Odwiedz tresera zwierzat, aby dowiedziec sie wiecej!
To idealny czas, by byc oswajaczem zwierzat. Te nowe ekscytujace techniki obchodzenia sie ze zwierzakami sa swietne!

Lata cierpliwosci i drobiazgowej nauki przyniosly efekty! Odkryto nowe techniki treningu zwierzat! Teraz treserzy zwierzat moga szkolic swoich podopiecznych, uczac ich nowych sposobow walki i przetrwania! Pierwszym krokiem jest oswojenie stworzenia. Znajdz stworzenie w dziczy i, korzystajac ze swoich umiejetnosci tresury zwierzat - oswoj je.!
Życie tresera zwierząt nie jest dla każdego, wróć do Tresera Zwierząt, jeśli chcesz spróbować ponownie.
Znajdz stworzenie na wolnosci i korzystajac z umiejetnosci oswajania zwierzat - oswoj je!
Dobrze! Teraz, gdy masz juz swojego zwierzaka, czas rozpoczac szkolenie!

,,Teraz, gdy twoje zwierze jest oswojone, musisz rozpoczac proces szkolenia. Zwierzeta beda trenowac podczas walki i beda robic postepy w walce z innymi stworzeniami. Zwierzeta najlepiej trenuja przeciwko dzikim stworzeniom i najwiecej naucza sie od najgrozniejszych stworzen na ziemiach Nelderim! Istnieje limit tego, ile zwierze moze nauczyc sie od jednego wroga, wiec upewnij sie, ze twoje zwierze ma nowych przeciwnikow!

Kiedy bedziesz gotowy, aby rozpoczac proces szkolenia, uzyj umiejetnosci Wiedza o zwierzetach na swoim zwierzaku i wybierz ,,Rozpocznij szkolenie zwierzat". Kiedy Twoj zwierzak zakonczy proces szkolenia, mozesz nauczyc go nowych sposobow walki i przetrwania!"

,,Uzyj umiejetnosci Wiedza o zwierzetach na swoim zwierzaku i wybierz ,,Rozpocznij szkolenie zwierzat".

,,
,,Kiedy bedziesz gotowy do rozpoczecia procesu szkolenia, uzyj umiejetnosci Wiedza o zwierzetach na swoim zwierzaku i wybierz ,,Rozpocznij szkolenie zwierzat".
Dobrze! Teraz, gdy Twoje zwierze rozpoczelo proces szkolenia zwierzat, wroc do trenera zwierzat, aby dowiedziec sie wiecej o kolejnych krokach.
Krok blizej w strone stania sie mistrzem Oswajania.
Ukonczyles zadanie zwiazane z Treningiem Zwierzat! Odwiedz Tresera Zwierzat, aby kontynuowac!

,,Teraz, gdy rozpoczales proces szkolenia, nadszedl czas, aby poprowadzic swojego zwierzaka do bitwy! Zwierzeta beda trenowac, gdy biora udzial w walce, i beda robic postepy, walczac z innymi stworzeniami. Zwierzeta najlepiej trenuja przeciwko dzikim stworzeniom i najwiecej sie ucza od najgrozniejszych stworzen w krolestwie! Istnieje limit tego, ile zwierze moze nauczyc sie od jednego wroga, wiec upewnij sie, ze ma nowych przeciwnikow! Gdy pasek ,,Postep w szkoleniu zwierzaka" sie zapelni, Twoj zwierzak jest gotowy aby nauczyc sie nowych sposobow walki i przetrwania.

Teraz musisz wyprowadzic swojego zwierzaka na wolnosc i walczyc z nim z innymi stworzeniami!"
,,Poprowadz swojego zwierzaka na wolnosc i walcz z innymi stworzeniami, az pasek ,,Postep w szkoleniu zwierzakow" sie zapelni."

,,Poprowadz swojego zwierzaka na wolnosc i walcz z nim przeciwko innym stworzeniom, az pasek ,,Postep w szkoleniu zwierzakow" sie zapelni. Pamietaj, ze zwierzaki najlepiej trenuja przeciwko dzikim stworzeniom i najwiecej naucza sie od najgrozniejszych stworzen w krolestwie! ograniczaj, ile zwierze moze nauczyc sie od pojedynczego wroga, wiec upewnij sie, ze twoje zwierze ma nowych przeciwnikow!"
*Stworzenie nabiera doswiadczenia bojowego i jest gotowe do treningu!*

Teraz, gdy twoje zwierze jest w pelni wytrenowane, nadszedl czas, aby nauczyc go czegos nowego! Uzyj umiejetnosci Lore Zwierzat na swoim zwierzeciu i wybierz Opcje Treningu Zwierzat". Menu Treningu Zwierzat wyswietla dostepne wlasciwosci treningowe, ktore mozna zastosowac do zwierzecia. W okienku Kategorie sa wyswietlone dostepne kategorie wlasciwosci: Statystyki i Odpornosci pozwalaja zwiekszyc poszczegolne statystyki i odpornosci dla zwierzecia. Zwiekszenie Maksymalnych Wartosci Umiejetnosci Magicznych i Zwiekszenie Maksymalnych Wartosci Umiejetnosci Bojowych umozliwia zwiekszenie maksymalnych wartosci umiejetnosci magicznych i bojowych. Ten proces wymaga uzycia Power Scrolli i zwieksza tylko maksymalna wartosc umiejetnosci, nadal bedziesz musial szkolic zwierze w konkretnej umiejetnosci poprzez tradycyjny trening umiejetnosci zwierzecia. Umiejetnosci Magiczne pozwalaja na nadanie zwierzeciu magicznych umiejetnosci w jednej z kilku szkol magii. Specjalne Umiejetnosci pozwalaja nadawac zwierzeciu specjalne umiejetnosci, inne niz te tradycyjnie znalezione jako specjalne ruchy broni. Ruchy Specjalne pozwalaja nadawac zwierzeciu specjalne ruchy, podobne do tych tradycyjnie znajdowanych jako specjalne ruchy broni. Umiejetnosci Obszarowe pozwalaja zwierzeciu na wykonywanie ataku obszarowego, celujacego w wielu przeciwnikow na obszarze. Gdy trenujesz swoje zwierze, liczba slotow kontrolnych, ktore zwierze wymaga, wzrosnie. Maksymalna liczba slotow kontrolnych, jakie moze posiadac jakiekolwiek zwierze, wynosi 5, jednak poszczegolne zwierzeta maja maksymalna liczbe slotow kontrolnych, do ktorych mozna je szkolic. Zwierze moze nauczyc sie tylko tyle podczas kazdego poziomu treningu. Kiedy miesza sie i dopasowuje sie wlasciwosci z menu Treningu Zwierzat, dostepna ilosc punktow treningowych bedzie sie zmniejszac w zaleznosci od wyborow. Rozne wybory wlasciwosci maja rozne koszty punktow treningowych. Kiedy jestes gotow, aby zastosowac nowa wlasciwosc do swojego zwierzecia, wybierz "Trenuj Zwierze" i potwierdz gotowosc do tego!"

Uzyj umiejetnosci Lore Zwierzat na swoim zwierzeciu i wybierz 'Opcje Treningu Zwierzat', aby dowolnie laczyc i dopasowywac wlasciwosci, ktore bedziesz trenowac u swojego zwierzecia. Gdy bedziesz zadowolony z wybranej wlasciwosci, wybierz 'Trenuj Zwierze' i potwierdz trening!
Odkryles Trening Zwierzat! Trenuj nowe zwierzeta i lacz wlasciwosci, aby stworzyc unikalne odmiany zwierzat do zabrania na pole bitwy! Powodzenia, Treserze Zwierzat!
Obecnie nie możesz oswoić tej istoty.
Brakuje ci umiejętności oswojenia wymaganej do trenowania tej istoty.

Istoty Magiczne: bake kitsune, cold drake, cu sidhe, dark steed, smok, dragon turtle, drake, dread warhorse, ptak drapieżny eodon, ognisty rumak, frost dragon, greater dragon, hellsteed, hiryu, ki-rin, lasher, lava lizard, lesser hiryu, koszmar, feniks, reptalon, smok seryjny, srebrny rumak, srebrny wilk, skree, triton, tsuki wilk, jednorożec, vollem, biały werm. Uwaga: Trenowanie tych istot w innych magiach usunie wszelkie inne magiczne zdolności. Istoty Nekromantyczne: dark steed, dark wolf, dire wolf, dread spider, dread warhorse, piekielny pies, piekielna kotka, hellsteed, koszmar, predator hellcat, shadow wyrm, szkieletowy kot, tsuki wilk, nietoperz wampir, windrunner. Istoty O Kleistej Skórze: korodujący śluz, wielka ropucha, śluz, toksyczny slith, triton. Istoty O Ogonach: aligator, bake kitsune, smok nienawiści, cold drake, puma, cu sidhe, dark wolf, pies, smok, dragon turtle, wilk smoczego wojownika, drake, ptak drapieżny eodon, frost dragon, gaman, gigantyczny lodowy robak, gigantyczny wąż, greater dragon, szary wilk, piekielny pies, piekielna kotka, high plains boura, hiryu, wąż lodowy, ki-rin, lava lizard, lava serpent, lava snake, lesser hiryu, lowland boura, pantera, predator hellcat, raptor, szczur, reptalon, rudny boura, saurosaurus, skorpion, serpentine dragon, ściekowa szczura, shadow wyrm, srebrny wilk, szkieletowy kot, skree, slith, snake, snow leopard, stone slith, toksyczny slith, triton, tsuki wilk, vollem, biały wilk, biały werm, dziki tygrys, windrunner. Tylko istoty z Wysp Tokuno są zdolne do nauki umiejętności Bushido & Ninjitsu. Istoty Owadopodobne: deathwatch beetle, fire ant, fire beetle, frost mite, gigantyczny chrząszcz, iron beetle, rune beetle.

Planowanie szkolenia zwierząt zapewnia trenerom możliwość przeglądania całkowitego kosztu ulepszeń, które chcieliby wprowadzić w swoim zwierzęciu. Aby włączyć planowanie szkolenia zwierząt, otwórz interfejs planowania, klikając przycisk "Plan" w menu Szkolenia Zwierząt. Teraz możesz włączyć planowanie, klikając "WŁĄCZ". W trybie planowania możesz planować ulepszenia bez szkolenia swojego zwierzęcia. Możesz zaplanować do 20 wyborów naraz, które podlegają normalnym ograniczeniom szkoleniowym. Gdy jesteś zadowolony z planu szkolenia, możesz wyłączyć tryb planowania i rozpocząć szkolenie swojego zwierzęcia, korzystając z planu jako praktycznego przewodnika i odniesienia.

Menu Szkolenia Zwierząt wyświetla wszystkie dostępne właściwości treningowe, które można zastosować do zwierzęcia. Okno Kategorii pokazuje kategorię dostępnych właściwości: Statystyki i odporności pozwalają zwiększyć indywidualne cechy statystyk i odporności zwierzęcia. Zwiększanie Ograniczeń Umiejętności Magicznych i Zwiększanie Ograniczeń Umiejętności Bojowych pozwala zwiększyć limity umiejętności dla różnych umiejętności magicznych i bojowych. Ten proces wymaga użycia Power Scrolls i tylko zwiększa limit umiejętności, nadal będziesz musiał szkolić zwierzę w konkretnej umiejętności za pomocą tradycyjnego szkolenia umiejętności zwierzęcia. Umiejętności Magiczne pozwalają nadać zwierzęciu magiczne zdolności w jednej z kilku szkół czarów. Specjalne Umiejętności pozwalają nadać zwierzęciu specjalne umiejętności, inne niż te tradycyjnie znajdowane jako specjalne ruchy broni. Specjalne Ruchy pozwalają nadać zwierzęciu specjalne ruchy, podobne do tych tradycyjnie znajdowanych jako specjalne ruchy broni. Efekty Obszarowe pozwalają nadać zwierzęciu atak obszarowy, celujący w wielu przeciwników w danym obszarze. Podczas gdy szkolisz swoje zwierzę, liczba używanych slotów na kontroli zwierzęcia wzrośnie. Maksymalna liczba slotów kontrolnych, które może mieć jakiekolwiek zwierzę, wynosi 5, jednak poszczególne zwierzęta mają maksymalną liczbę slotów kontrolnych, do których można je szkolić. Zwierzę może nauczyć się tylko tyle w trakcie każdego poziomu szkolenia. Gdy mieszasz i dopasowujesz właściwo

Ukonczenie tego szkolenia usunie wszystkie zdolnosci magiczne z tego zwierzaka. Kazde szkolenie zwierzaka jest ostateczne i nie mozna sie go oduczyc. Czy chcesz ukonczyc to szkolenie?
Obecnie nie masz zadnych zwierzat domowych, ktore sa w trakcie szkolenia.
Zobacz postep treningu w czasie rzeczywistym.
[Godzina mocy szkolenia zwierzat]: Twoje zwierze bedzie pod wplywem zwiekszonego postepu szkolenia przez nastepna godzine!
[Godzina mocy szkolenia zwierzaka]: Twoj zwierzak nie podlega juz efektom zwiekszonego postepu szkolenia.

In Commemoration Of Twenty Amazing Years! Thank You And Happy Anniversary!

Ricardo unwittingly stole a piece of the Gem of Immortality for Minax. Focusing the magic of the gem with a lighthouse, the Enchantress was able to open a gate to another world: a fallen and lawless version of Sosaria where the Shadowlords were victorious. While Blackthorn wasn't able to completely close the tear between worlds, he was able to restrict entry of the invaders to his castle's dungeon.

After losing key support from the mage Anon and facing increased hostilities in Felucca, King Blackthorn put out a call to arms. Sir Dupre was the first to pledge his support to the cause and led the forces of Virtue against Vice on the fallen facet. Lord British briefly returned to this world to share advice and memories with his old friend.

Wishing to open the Silver Gate to Shadowguard, the Time Lord Hawkwind had the citizens of Britannia recover four gems: a Sapphire Dragon Eye, a Wolfgang Ruby, a Rondorin Emerald, and Beatrix's Despair Diamond. Anon's interference caused the spell to accidentally fuse the world of Eodon with Shadowguard, starting the Time of Legends.

The arrival of Sosarians on Eodon caused conflicts with the indigenous human tribes and the insect species know as the Myrmidex. Peace was eventually brokered with Eodon's people and Britannia, and this alliance fought a desperate war against the Myrmidex. In the course of the war, the lost city of Kotlan was found, and an ancient Kotl weapon known as Zipactriotl was activated.
The future has yet to be written...

A Soul Trapped Within A Phylactery
Recovered from an Ambushed Trade Route
A tool used by those wishing to entrap the souls of the undead and command them to do their bidding.
The amulet bears a large pentagram hanging from a series of interlocking beads.  Small bits of daemon flesh grind between the links as you manipulate them.

The gorget appears to have been modified to fit the neck of a large creature.  There are chafe marks scarring the interior showing signs of struggle against it by the wearer.  Large rings stud the circumference of the gorget.
The map shows the location of several locations throughout Britannia, but none seem to stand out as noteworthy.

The large tome is adorned with a pentagram, not uncommon to many arcane items found throughout Britannia.  There appear to be pages upon pages of ritualistic instructions and incantations, none of which are in a familiar language.
The wand is pretty standard among other wands you may have seen.  The twin shaft is made of cedar and is crested with an intricate pentagram made of etched rock, inlaid with blueish crystals.
The goblet is relatively unassuming.  The interior of the pewter cup is stained a deep ruby.  An etching of a pentagram decorates the base.
The crescent blade is crude but you surmise is formidable for performing intricate engraving work.  The tip is stained with the shavings of wax and soft metal.
The strong smell of sage and deadwood emanates from the bundle.
Not unlike tools used to provoke a response from an intended victim, this whip is studded with beads of hard rock.  The leather is stained deep red from repeated self use.
Often used during official ceremonies and ritual this long flowing vestment is worn draped over the neck and is embroidered with pentagrams at either end.
*Your proficiency in ~1_SKILL~ reveals more about the item*
This is not a ring, bracelet, necklace, earring, or talisman.
Target rings, bracelets, necklaces, earrings, or talisman in your backpack. You may also target a sub-container to add contents to the the jewelry box. When done, press ESC.
You must be carrying the item to add it to the jewelry box.

The map appears unlike other treasure maps common to this area.  The map is much newer and includes detailed notations related to the treasure hoard's proximity to major trade routes.
I saw your ad, can I buy some maps?

You and everyone else!  Ever since running that ad we haven't been able to keep anything in stock, treasure maps especially!  Look friend, don't take this the wrong way but you wouldn't want to get involved in treasure hunting.  Dangerous business you know.
I think I can handle it.  I've got coin!
The coin is nay the problem!  I merely do not have any more maps to sell!
Perhaps I could find them for myself?
I suppose there is no harm in telling you...you will probably end up getting yourself eaten by something and my associates and I will scavenge that fancy gear of yours *chuckles*

*nervous laugh* Fine, fine!  Us Treasure Hunters get together every so often, and recently we have been coming across some strange stuff buried out there.  Normally we find pirate treasure or the hidden stash of some highway bandits, but recently...I dunno.  Instead of rusty chests there have been these...objects.  I really dunno how to describe them.  Kinda like a statue with weird carvings...and the flashes and thunder, really bizarre.  Treasure's all there though, same creatures still protecting them, just now we been finding these statue things from maps recovered from Hythloth, Deceit, and Destard.  Good luck getting your hands on one though!
Well met, *mumbles* can't wait to come across your corpse in...I mean good luck with everything and thanks for stopping in!
Feeling Pressure, Crown Announces Tariff Reduction to Spur Trade

His Royal Highness Lord Blackthorn was on site in the City of Trinsic to announce a reduction in tariffs on trade orders throughout the realm. Feeling the pressure from merchants and citizens alike, representatives of the Britannian Tax Council hope the reduction in tariffs will spur trade and bolster local treasuries. Addressing a small crowd of Trinsic's merchants, artisans, and paladins, The King stated firmly the Crown's commitment to the fiscal prosperity of all of Britannia's cities. "We must remember Britannia is only as strong as her people and cities, so I am pleased to announce my government will do more with less and stretch every coin that goes into funding the safety, security, and prosperity of a functioning Kingdom!", his Royal Highness announced. When pressed by questions from the crowd regarding reports of trade carts burdened with casks of wine, ale, and liquors being delivered to His Majesty's castle and the need for paying a large standing army in these relatively peaceful times the King was ushered off by his agents as he waved to the on looking crowd. Following the announcement of the tariff reduction, His Majesty took a tour of Trinsic with representatives from the local government and visited with leaders of local guilds. During his tour the King sampled baked goods from Baked Delights before attending a magic demonstration at Encyclopedia Magika and taking in an evening concert at Meeting Hall Park. Some seemed optimistic while others took the visit of the King with contempt, "I dun' understand why we have to pay for these trade deals anyway! Who's the Governor think they are to pick? I got the coin, why should I pay it to a bunch of corrupt artisans who are going to waste it anyway! Not to mention all the coin they spend on booze in that castle! Bunch of drunkards they are!" Janet Boggerby of Trinsic's barrier island commented. Still, the reduction in tariffs are sure to spur trade deliveries across the realm and citizens are advised to take caution while making deliveries on Britannia's roads.
Classifieds: Yearning for Adventure?  HUGE Treasure Map Sale!

Thanks to a recent operation by the Royal Britannian Guard we have come into possession of a number of treasure maps ready to make you rich, and we're passing the savings on to you!  Want to buy your special someone a cenny diamond?  Looking to upgrade that tattered and worn out armor?  Does the old blade look a little worse for wear?  Finally time to move out of your bankbox and build your dream home?  Vendor salaries drying up your coin purse?  Whatever it is, the lucrative profession of treasure hunting can have you swimming in fat stacks of coin before Trammel and Felucca are full again!  We've got all the supplies necessary for your budding treasure hunting career covered at Needful Things, just Northeast of the central teleporters in Jhelom!  Picks, shovels, lockpicks, bolts and even chickens!  Anything and everything is on sale and we need to move inventory fast!  So come on down to Needful Things and see us about our Introductory Treasure Hunter special - complete with a treasure map and everything you need to strike it rich!  Don't delay! Act now!
Extra! Extra! Breakin at the Lycaeum! Read the latest Town Cryer for more!

Rumors have been circulating of increased bandit activity on trade routes across Britannia and treasure hunters are encountering strange objects buried in the countryside. Neither of these seem terribly out of the ordinary, but they are curious to say the least.  It's just another day in Britannia, and while you hunger for adventure you are quite content with the relative calm across the realm.  Seems like a good day to take in the sunshine and check out the latest edition of the Town Cryer.
Read the latest edition of the Town Cryer.
A step closer to finding out the nature of recent events.
You can't be bothered with the goings on of the realm, besides today is a day for relaxation!
Five gold seems a bit steep for a newspaper, but at least there are nice illustrations.

The article in the Town Cryer has left you filled with curiosity and slight concern.  This isn't the first time something has gone awry at the Lycaeum, especially with all they do there.  You remain unconvinced the article is anything but sensationalist journalism at the hand of Britannia's newest periodical.  The article mentioned interviews with some citizens in Vesper at the Marsh Hall.  Perhaps you should visit yourself and see what the scuttlebutt is all about.
Visit the Marsh Hall in Vesper and speak to the taverngoers.

It seems the consensus in the tavern is similar to yours, and it's just another slow news day in Britannia.  Still, your curiosity eats at your skepticism.  There may be something here worth investigating.
Murder in Moonglow! Lycaeum Ransacked - Again!

Once again the quiet countryside of Moonglow was rocked as the Lycaeum played host to a series of crimes.  On the heels of noteworthy crimes in the past, this latest series of vile deeds only underscores the need for better scrutiny at Britannia's premier center for learning.  The Royal Britannian Guard reaffirmed its stance that these "unlikely" incidents are few and far between and their efforts to curtail crime have resulted in a safer and more secure Britannia.  Still, some Britannians are alarmed while others dismiss this and recent events.  Speaking from a villa in Moonglow, local trader Arthur Vandelthorn said, "These things happen - and despite the crimes, the realm is prospering.  I've got the air in my lungs and Moonglow Red in my glass, what more is there?"  The investigation is still ongoing, yet the Royal Britannian Guard reports at least the theft of some items of magical importance and several fatalities.  Members of the public are urged to contact Inspector Samuel Karny at the Lycaeum with any information.
Buy Editions of the Town Cryer
Read the latest edition of the Town Cryer.  You can purchase the paper from any City Herald.
*You find their perspective insightful, but you think it best to talk with other patrons*

*squeak! squeak!*  I hope you'll pardon the intrusion, but I couldn't help but overhear your conversations with some of the tavern goers *mousy-grin*  Perhaps you could see fit to lend me your attention so that I may perhaps give you a different perspective of things? *the mouse scurries off to a corner of the tavern*

*squeak squeak* Thank you for taking the time to speak to me! *mousey grin*  What if I told you the recent events you've read about in the Town Cryer were the beginning of a terrible evil?  I know...I know...you've heard it before and I'm sure you'll want to know what's in it for you.  I can only tell you what I've seen and heard, and heroes like you will need to stand and defend Britannia against the coming evil.  There are powerful forces at work in the ethereal void!  I may be just a mouse but you don't have to take my word for it!  Take this spell scroll and use it to travel to the Ethereal Void.  There you will meet a mage called Mythran, please give him this note.  Learn from him all you can, and together we may stand a chance!
Use the Ethereal Travel spell and deliver Sherry's note to Mythran.
Who's got time to listen to some crazy mouse.  Mice aren't even supposed to speak!  Surely there's something worth spending money on in Luna that's a better use of your time!
You have used the Ethereal Travel spell to travel to Mythran's home in the Ethereal void.  It is a strange place.  You find him milling about inside and deliver the letter.
A note from Sherry the Mouse to Mythran
*The note is written in an indecipherable language that seems unworldly*

Given you haven't jumped into the void I'll assume your intentions are genuine, what's this? *You hand him the note*  Sherry is persistent isn't she.  She is right you know, even though I doubt Britannians will listen.  The ambushes you've read about, the strange objects recovered from the maps?  And now the incident at your Lycaeum?  They are all related you know - and I'm afraid the situation is not good.  If you'd like to read more of my research feel free to explore my home, the jist of it, however, is your world and my...former..world are on a collision course with an ancient and powerful evil.  I know, I know, its something you've heard before - but you must understand.  This is different.  My colleague Heigel was researching at the Lycaeum.  I haven't been able to reach him since the article in the Town Cryer about the break-in there.  Would you check on him, it would mean the world to me.
Go to the Lycaeum in Moonglow and discover Heigel's fate.
A talking mouse and now this crazy old man talking about ancient evils?  I'm not getting roped into this mess!
You've found Heigel, however he is badly injured.  The article in the Town Cryer didn't seem like the crimes here were as bad as they are before you...
*The note details Hegeil's Research findings...it doesn't make much sense to you now.*

*Cough...Cough*  Heigel looks into your eyes and before shuffling off into the eternal void, he slips you a rolled piece of parchment.  Looking into your eyes his dyeing words are, "Go to Mythran...Become the Warrior of Ether"
You turn your back on the final wish of a dying man.  Shame!
Take the parchment Heigel gave you to Mythran and tell him of Heigel's fate.

You found Heigel, however he was badly injured.  Despite your best efforts to offer first aid, his lifeforce slipped away as you comforted him in your arms.  You deliver the news and the parchment to Mythran.

Heigel's death only underscores the seriousness of what must be done.  Fortunately Heigel was able to isolate incidents across Britannia that are directly related to the recovery of the components of the obelisk.  We must continue Heigel's research, with it we can recover the artifacts and you can become a Warrior of Ether!  Only then will you be powerful enough to fight the coming threats from Pagan...
The power to fight the evils from Pagan
How dare you turn your back on your destiny!  Britannia is doomed unless we find a way to defend against the coming threats of Pagan!
Continue Heigel's research and recover the missing obelisk artifacts to become the Warrior of Ether.

You have truly learned the way of Pagan magics and the origins of Britannian magery.  With this knowledge you have become a Warrior of Ether!  You feel equipped to handle the coming threats to the realm!
Hello there, welcome to my home.  I am Mythran.
Have you been to Lycaeum? Was Heigel safe?
You have recovered all the obelisk artifacts.  Return to Mythran!
I'll have another mug of ale, and send over some bacon! All this ale has given me a King's hunger!
I'm no wench, but could I buy you a drink?
Well met...and of course!  I'm never one to turn down a free drink!
What business are you in, mate?
I'm a dealer of this and that, a merchant of sorts.  If it's *hic* something I can move off the shelves, I'm willing to buy and sell it!
Have you read the latest Town Cryer?
That old rag?  Don't know why we even need that paper - bunch of sensationalist stories if you ask me!
That sort of thing happens all the time, and that's what we've got the guards for!  No matter, hasn't hurt my business - so nothing to be concerned about as far as I care.
Who am I to begrudge some treasure hunters trying to make some honest coin?  So they dug up some weird stuff, people do that all the time!  Once I caught a pillow fishing - the strangest thing!
They need to up the security at the Lycaeum, less this sort of thing is going to keep happening - ah no bother.  Hopefully whatever they stole ends up on the market and it'll fetch me some coin!
What do you want? I'm off duty!
Guards aren't allowed to accept gifts.  But if you buy an extra mug of cider and I happen to drink it, no calling the guards! *winks*
No, I wear platemail because I like the way it tones the muscles in my legs during kilt season.  Of course I'm a guard!

Has it? If you citizens only knew the half of what we dealt with on a regular basis, you'd never leave your homes!  Lucky for you there's guys like me who stand up to the scum of our society and make sure you are safe!
Roads are dangerous places, always best to check in with guard outposts when going on long journeys.  And carry a blade or bow.
Did they find the treasure inside city limits? No? Then I'll concentrate on this cider. *glug* *glug* *glug*
We don't comment on investigations that are ongoing.
*She looks at you with disinterest and a furled lip*
Begging thy pardon, may I sit?
Fine day? Care for some wine?
Oh? *she smiles a bit and extends her cup as if she expected it*
I have one of my servants read it to me.  I think they make up stories to sell issues.
People ought not to go on the roads anyway, dangerous places!  Wouldn't catch me out there without my personal militia.
I've got plenty of treasure, you could probably use some of it though *smiles slightly and shuffles away some*
Moonglow is too hot anyway!  The climate here in Vesper is much more appealing.

The power of Theurgy is one granted by the Titan Stratos, this much I have learned from my studies of Pagan magics.  What interests me most, however, is the recent events in the City of Minoc.  It would seem that whilst digging there a group of miners uncovered what few have seen, but many are calling a most peculiar artifact!  I can only guess the miners have located a hidden focus of Theurgy.  Alas, without intervention I fear the miners may be trapped long after their supplies run out and the secrets of their discovery will be lost to time...

The power to destroy is a tenet of Britannian Magia, and it would seem the origins of this magic have roots in Pagan Sorcery!  I have read much of Pyros, the bringer of destruction, the vile and towering fire daemon from whence the power of Sorcery originates!  The recent fires in Britain only support my hypothesis that a great daemon has descended upon the quiet countryside there.  What bothers me though, is the proximity of Britain to a source of great fire - for there is none, and were a daemon of sufficient destructive nature to land in Britannia my assumptions would only lead me to believe it would be a location brimming with the fiery powers of creation from deep within the planet's core.  Alas mastering Sorcery requires extremely precise placement of reagents and candles around a pentagram, before the focus is conjured in the center.  While I have not been able to discern the precise location of the candles for any spells, I have done significant research on the Summon Perihelion reagent locations.  It seems obsidian is the foundation of the power of the perihelion, while daemon bone is rightly placed at the aphelion.  The positions of pumice and ash are still unknown to me...

In Britannian parlance Necromancy is a school of magic exclusively associated with the undead, brought to Britannia by the Necromancers of Umbra and the Age of Shadows.  As it would seem, however, Pagan too has harnessed the power to control the undead, but in a most peculiar manner!  Instead of controlling the beyond directly, Pagan Necromancy draws its power from Lithos - the great titan of earth!  It is fitting that we return to the dusts of earth in our demise and the seismic rumblings in Skara Brae are certainly responsible for the undead there.  Giving them peace is the only way, I have found, to possibly return them from whence they came and quiet the Skaran coastline...

Little is known of Tempestry, yet the power of Hydros is written of extensively as told to me by Mythran.  What is known, however, is the recent floods in Vesper are no doubt the result of an unsettled and disturbed soul searching for something once lost.  Finding it may be the only course to see the flood waters recede there...
*You recover an unusual wand from the corpse...*
Recovered from the Undead near Skara Brae

This wand is similar to the one described in Heigel's research.  The shaft is made of etched white metal, with jade adornments.  A skull sits on top.  It doesn't feel real.  Not that you've had the pleasure of handling many skulls...
*The scroll seems unwilling to unfurl.  Perhaps it belongs in a spellbook of otherworldly origin...*
That is not a spell scroll this spellbook can hold.
The spell scroll and the spellbook magically bind!
You may only attempt this spell once per day.

*As you touch the Key of the Caretaker to the pouch magic surges through the wand and a portal opens above your head in a crash of thunder!  Immediately the undead around you are overcome with peace as they are physical presence is rekindled to the earth from whence they came.  As the smoke clears you see the small magical pouch is a bit more burdensome...you open it to find the Heart of Earth!*
Recovered from a strange treasure hoard
A rather unassuming candle, from what you understand it has some ritualistic use.

*Just as the words of power leave your lips, the candles begin to flicker as a gentle wind is pulled towards the locus.  A portal opens above the pentagram and in a flash of light a small daemon shaped figure now sits in the middle!*
A Perihelion has already been summoned!
*The focus is consumed as a massive daemon appears!*

With a might howl from your final attack, the Perihelion shrieks in agony as you drain its final bit of life.  As the great flaming creature falls to its knees a stone object emerges from the embers of the corpse - you have recovered the Tongue of Flames!

As you clutch the quicksilver focus in your hand and declare the words of power you are overcome with an intense flash and your body feels cool as you pass through a barrier of wind where the rock slide once stood.  You have harnessed the Pagan power of Theurgy to move through the rock slide and deliver a much needed means of escape to the trapped miners.  Thankful for your intervention, they present you with a peculiar artifact they found while mining.  You have recovered the Breath of Air!

Many generations ago I became a hero to my people.  I fell in love with my Apprentice, and we were to undergo the Ceremony of Bonding...but...tragedy befell us as Hydros let his displeasure be known, sending a great wave that washed away my beloved into the sea...I have nothing left of my beloved.  If only I had a memento to remember her...
If only I had a memento of my beloved...
Recover a memento of Kalen's apprentice lost to the seas, likely entangled in the remains of a ship marked by an SOS...
You have recovered the staff of Kalen's apprentice.  Return to Kalen!
This...means so much to me.  I can now be at peace.  I have no need for this any longer, please take it...

As you lift the heavy chest from the depths the sea snarls as it breaks the surface!  You open the rusted lock and inside the chest is a long, oak staff.  Despite a lengthy stay on the ocean floor the staff seems to be in fair shape.  As you wrap your fingers around it and begin to lift your boat is lurched!  Immediately you are overcome with a sense of despair as you share the feelings of loss Kalen's apprentice experienced as Hydros pulled her beneath the waves.  Just as quickly these feelings fade.  The seas calm and your boat steadies.  Your intentions must be true.  Return the staff to Kalen.

Necromancy
Grant Peace
In Vas Corp

1 Key of the Caretaker
1 small pouch
1 executioner's cap
1 blackmoore

Necromancy is the magic of earth, and from the life giving rock Lithos so too comes death. The magics of Necromancy harness that power to cast spells that manipulate the undead and the ground from whence they came. Grant Peace allows the necromancer to give peace to an undead creature, destroying them should the caster so desire. The casting of necromantic spells requires the Key of the Caretaker, a wand given to initiate Necromants. The necromancer is able to use the wand on a small pouch with the necessary reagents inside to achieve the desired result.

Sorcery
Summon Perihelion
Kal Flam Corp Xen

4 Red Candles
1 Black Candle
1 Pumice
1 Daemon Bone
2 Obsidian
1 Sulfurous Ash

Sorcery is a powerful school of magic that harnesses the power of Pyros to cast destructive spells. Like other magics of Pagan, Sorcery utilizes the creation of a focus to embody the power of a spell into a small object that can then be activated to result in the desired outcome.
Creating a Sorcery focus requires red and black candles, reagents, and a pentagram. Knowing the positions of the pentagram is equally as important as the necessary candles and reagents, as their correct placement on the pentagram is required to create the focus. The center of the pentagram is called the locus. Directly atop the locus is the aphelion. Directly left and right of the locus are the mesostel pa and mesostel ze. The left and right legs of the pentagram are known as the perivolcan pa and perivolcan ze.
Placing the candles and reagents at the correct locations speak the words of power to cast the spell and create the focus. The caster should take caution when summoning the Perihelion, for it is a destructive and unpredictable beast!

Theurgy
Intervention
In Sanct An Jux

1 Focus of Theurgy

Theurgy, the magic of air, is derived from the power of Stratos and focuses on the magics of change. Like other magics of Pagan, Theurgy utilizes the creation of a focus to embody the power of a spell into a small object that can then be activated to result in the desired outcome.
Unlike other schools of Pagan magic which utilize reagents, however, Theurgy foci can be crafted by tinkers learned in magic. With enough quicksilver, the focus of theurgy can be crafted to cast "Intervention", harnessing the powers of wind to propel the caster through immovable objects. By speaking the words of power with the focus in your backpack, Theurgy draws its strength from the Breath of Air, and the foci are only functional in the proximity to the artifact.

THE REALM HAS BEEN INVADED!

CITIZENS ADVISED TO TAKE REFUGE ON THE ISLE OF JHELOM!

KING BLACKTHORN DRAFTS ALL ABLE BODIED CITIZENS TO IMMEDIATE SERVICE TO DEFEND THE REALM!

LONG LIVE BRITANNIA! LONG LIVE KING BLACKTHORN!
Titan Threat Quelled!  Britannians Rejoice in Victory!  Celebratory Parade Held in Britain!

In a magnificent and courageous effort, the titan threat to Britannia has been quelled!  Citizens from across the realm headed the Call to Arms and came to defense of the Realm to drive off the off-worldly forces of Khumash-Gor and the Pagan titans!  This reporter is told that the heroic efforts of Heigel the Scholar to research the nature of the invasion, coupled with the strong will of the Britannian people to act on his research are the primary reasons Britannia is once again safe!  In response to these acts of bravery, King Blackthorn has bestowed the title Hero of Britannia to many citizens.  Speaking from the head float of the parade in Britain, His Majesty commended by the Royal Britannian Guard and those responsible for this overwhelming victory!  Celebrations in Britain are ongoing as each of Britannia's cities are represented in a magnificent parade snaking the streets of Eastern Britain.  Despite the victory, Britannians are still recovering from the turmoil.  And while the wounds of these times will need time to heal, heal they will as the will of the Britannian people is as resolute as the Virtues themselves!  Long live Britannia!  Long live King Blackthorn!
